atk-s0512a0:1556_3: saṃvejesi. So saṃviggamānaso gharāvāse ukkaṇṭhito pabbajitukāmo hutvā amacce itthāgāre
atk-s0512a0:1556_4: ca pucchi. Tepi pabbajitukāmā ahesuṃ. Atha rājā candādeviṃ ādiṃ katvā soḷasa sahasse
atk-s0512a0:1556_5: orodhe ca amaccādike ca pabbajitukāme ñatvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi – “ye mama puttassa
atk-s0512a0:1556_6: santike pabbajitukāmā, te pabbajantū”ti. Suvaṇṇakoṭṭhāgārādīni ca vivarāpetvā vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1556_7: Nāgarā ca yathāpasāriteyeva āpaṇe vivaṭadvārāneva gehāni ca pahāya rañño santikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1556_8: agamaṃsu. Rājā mahājanena saddhiṃ mahāsattassa santike pabbaji. Sakkadattiyaṃ tiyojanikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1557_0: Sāmantarājāno “kāsirājā pabbajito”ti sutvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ gahessāmā”ti nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a0:1557_1: devanagarasadisaṃ nagaraṃ sattaratanabharitaṃ devavimānakappaṃ rājanivesanañca disvā
atk-s0512a0:1557_2: “imaṃ dhanaṃ nissāya bhayena bhavitabba”nti tāvadeva nikkhamitvā pāyāsuṃ. Tesaṃ āgamanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1557_3: sutvā mahāsatto vanantaṃ gantvā ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ desesi. Te sabbe saddhiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1557_4: parisāya tassa santike pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ aparepi aparepīti mahāsamāgamo ahosi. Sabbe
atk-s0512a0:1557_5: phalāphalāni paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Yo kāmādivitakkaṃ vitakketi, tassa
atk-s0512a0:1557_6: cittaṃ ñatvā mahāsatto tattha gantvā ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0512a0:1558_0: So dhammassavanasappāyaṃ labhitvā samāpattiyo abhiññāyo ca nibbatteti. Evaṃ aparopi
atk-s0512a0:1558_1: aparopīti sabbepi jīvitapariyosāne brahmalokaparāyanā ahesuṃ. Tiracchānagatāpi mahāsatte
atk-s0512a0:1558_2: isigaṇepi cittaṃ pasādetvā chasu kāmasaggesu nibbattiṃsu. Mahāsattassa brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1558_3: ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ pavattittha. Tadā chatte adhivatthā devatā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:1558_4: sārathi sāriputtatthero, mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni, parisā buddhaparisā, temiyapaṇḍito lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1559_0: Tassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī idha matthakaṃ pattā, sesapāramiyopi yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1559_1: Tathā māsajātakālato paṭṭhāya nirayabhayaṃ pāpabhīrutā rajjajigucchā nekkhammanimittaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1559_2: mūgādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ tattha ca virodhippaccayasamodhānepi niccalabhāvoti evamādayo
atk-s0512a0:1563_0: 67. Sattame yadā ahaṃ kapi āsinti yasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0512a0:1563_1: nāgabalo thāmasampanno assapotakappamāṇo mahāsarīro kapi homi. Nadīkūle darīsayeti
atk-s0512a0:1563_2: ekissā nadiyā tīre ekasmiṃ darībhāge yadā vāsaṃ kappemīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1564_0: Tadā kira bodhisatto yūthapariharaṇaṃ akatvā ekacaro hutvā vihāsi. Tassā pana nadiyā
atk-s0512a0:1564_1: vemajjhe eko dīpako nānappakārehi ambapanasādīhi phalarukkhehi sampanno. Bodhisatto
atk-s0512a0:1564_2: thāmajavasampannatāya nadiyā orimatīrato uppatitvā dīpakassa pana nadiyā ca majjhe
atk-s0512a0:1564_3: eko piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi, tasmiṃ patati. Tato uppatitvā tasmiṃ dīpake patati. So tattha
atk-s0512a0:1564_4: nānappakārāni phalāphalāni khāditvā sāyaṃ teneva upāyena paccāgantvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a0:1564_5: vasitvā punadivasepi tatheva karoti. Iminā niyāmena vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0512a0:1565_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle eko kumbhīlo sapajāpatiko tassaṃ nadiyaṃ vasati. Tassa bhariyā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1565_1: aparāparaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā tassa hadayamaṃse dohaḷaṃ uppādetvā kumbhīlaṃ āha – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1565_2: kho, ayyaputta, imassa vānarassa hadayamaṃse dohaḷo uppanno”ti. So “sādhu, bhadde,
atk-s0512a0:1565_3: lacchasī”ti vatvā “ajja taṃ sāyaṃ dīpakato āgacchantameva gaṇhissāmī”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe
atk-s0512a0:1565_4: nipajji. Bodhisatto taṃ divasaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā sāyanhasamaye dīpake ṭhitova pāsāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1565_5: oloketvā “ayaṃ pāsāṇo idāni uccataro khāyati, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintesi. Mahāsattassa
atk-s0512a0:1565_6: hi udakappamāṇañca pāsāṇappamāṇañca suvavatthāpitameva hoti. Tenassa etadahosi –
atk-s0512a0:1565_7: “ajja imissā nadiyā udakaṃ neva hāyati, atha ca panāyaṃ pāsāṇo mahā hutvā paññāyati,
atk-s0512a0:1565_8: kacci nu kho ettha mayhaṃ gahaṇatthāya kumbhīlo nipanno”ti?
atk-s0512a0:1566_0: So “vīmaṃsissāmi tāva na”nti tattheva ṭhatvā pāsāṇena saddhiṃ kathento viya “bho,
atk-s0512a0:1566_1: pāsāṇā”ti vatvā paṭivacanaṃ alabhanto yāvatatiyaṃ “bho, pāsāṇā”ti āha. Pāsāṇo paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1566_2: na deti. Punapi bodhisatto “kiṃ, bho pāsāṇa, ajja mayhaṃ paṭivacanaṃ na desī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1566_3: Kumbhīlo “addhā ayaṃ pāsāṇo aññesu divasesu vānarindassa paṭivacanaṃ deti maññe,
atk-s0512a0:1566_4: ajja pana mayā ottharitattā na deti, handāhaṃ dassāmissa paṭivacana”nti cintetvā
atk-s0512a0:1566_5: “kiṃ vānarindā”ti āha. “Kosi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ kumbhīlo”ti. “Kimatthaṃ ettha nipannosī”ti?
atk-s0512a0:1566_6: “Tava hadayaṃ patthayamāno”ti. Bodhisatto cintesi – “añño me gamanamaggo natthi,
atk-s0512a0:1566_7: paṭiruddhaṃ vata me gamana”nti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1571_0: Tattha “pīḷito susumārenā”ti addhagāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ. “Yamhokāse”ti gāthāya pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1571_1: karoti. Tattha yamhokāseti yasmiṃ nadīmajjhe ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇasaṅkhāte padese ṭhatvā.
atk-s0512a0:1571_2: Orāti dīpakasaṅkhātā oratīrā. Pāranti tadā mama vasanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nadiyā paratīraṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1571_3: Patāmahanti uppatitvā patāmi ahaṃ. Tatthacchīti tasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇappadese sattubhūto
atk-s0512a0:1571_4: vadhako ekanteneva ghātako paccatthiko luddadassano ghorarūpo bhayānakadassano nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:1572_0: Atha mahāsatto cintesi – “añño me gamanamaggo natthi, ajja mayā kumbhīlo vañcetabbo,
atk-s0512a0:1572_1: evañhi ayañca mahatā pāpato mayā parimocito siyā, mayhañca jīvitaṃ laddha”nti. So
atk-s0512a0:1572_2: kumbhīlaṃ āha – “samma, kumbhīla, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ upari patissāmī”ti. Kumbhīlo “vānarinda,
atk-s0512a0:1572_3: papañcaṃ akatvā ito āgacchāhī”ti āha. Mahāsatto “ahaṃ āgacchāmi, tvaṃ pana attano
atk-s0512a0:1572_4: mukhaṃ vivaritvā maṃ tava santikaṃ āgatakāle gaṇhāhī”ti avoca. Kumbhīlānañca mukhe
atk-s0512a0:1572_5: vivaṭe akkhīni nimmīlanti. So taṃ kāraṇaṃ asallakkhento mukhaṃ vivari. Athassa akkhīni
atk-s0512a0:1572_6: nimmīliṃsu. So mukhaṃ vivaritvā sabbaso nimmīlitakkhī hutvā nipajji. Mahāsatto tassa
atk-s0512a0:1572_7: tathābhāvaṃ ñatvā dīpakato uppatito gantvā kumbhīlassa matthakaṃ akkamitvā tato uppatanto
atk-s0512a0:1572_8: vijjulatā viya vijjotamāno paratīre aṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1574: “So maṃ asaṃsi ehīti, ahampemīti taṃ vadiṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1576: Tattha asaṃsīti abhāsi. Ahampemīti ahampi āgacchāmīti taṃ kathesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1577_0: Yasmā pana taṃ dīpakaṃ ambajambupanasādiphalarukkhasaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nivāsayoggañca,
atk-s0512a0:1577_1: “āgacchāmī”ti pana paṭiññāya dinnattā saccaṃ anurakkhanto mahāsattopi “āgamissāmevā”ti
atk-s0512a0:1579: “Na tassa alikaṃ bhaṇitaṃ, yathā vācaṃ akāsaha”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1580: Yasmā cetaṃ saccānurakkhaṇaṃ attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kataṃ, tasmā āha –
atk-s0512a0:1581: “Saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1582_0: Kumbhīlo pana taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā “iminā vānarindena atiaccherakaṃ kata”nti cintetvā
atk-s0512a0:1582_1: “bho vānarinda, imasmiṃ loke catūhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo amitte abhibhavati,
atk-s0512a0:1582_2: te sabbepi tuyhaṃ abbhantare atthi maññe”ti āha –
atk-s0512a0:1584: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1585_0: Tattha yassāti yassa kassaci puggalassa. Eteti idāni vattabbe paccakkhato dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:1585_1: Caturo dhammāti cattāro guṇā. Saccanti vacīsaccaṃ, “mama santikaṃ āgamissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a0:1585_2: musāvādaṃ akatvā āgato evāti etaṃ te vacīsaccaṃ. Dhammoti vicāraṇapaññā, “evaṃ kate
atk-s0512a0:1585_3: idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti pavattā te esā vicāraṇapaññā. Dhitīti abbocchinnaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1585_4: vuccati, etampi te atthi. Cāgoti attapariccāgo, tvaṃ attānaṃ pariccajitvā mama santikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1585_5: āgato, yaṃ panāhaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mayhamevesa doso. Diṭṭhanti paccāmittaṃ. So
atk-s0512a0:1585_6: ativattatīti yassa puggalassa yathā tava evaṃ ete cattāro dhammā atthi, so yathā
atk-s0512a0:1585_7: maṃ tvaṃ ajja atikkanto, tatheva attano paccāmittaṃ atikkamati abhibhavatīti.
atk-s0512a0:1586: Evaṃ kumbhīlo bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Tadā kumbhīlo devadatto ahosi, tassa bhariyā ciñcamāṇavikā, kapirājā pana lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1587_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā udakassa pāsāṇassa
atk-s0512a0:1587_1: ca pamāṇavavatthānena idāni pāsāṇo uccataro khāyatīti pariggaṇhanavasena pāsāṇassa
atk-s0512a0:1587_2: upari susumārassa nipannabhāvajānanaṃ, pāsāṇena kathanāpadesena tassatthassa nicchayagamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1587_3: susumārassa upari akkamitvā sahasā paratīre patiṭṭhānavasena sīghakāritāya tassa
atk-s0512a0:1587_4: mahatā pāpato parimocanaṃ, attano jīvitarakkhaṇaṃ, saccavācānurakkhaṇañcāti evamādayo
atk-s0512a0:1590_0: Aṭṭhame tāpaso saccasavhayoti saccasaddena avhātabbo saccanāmako tāpaso yadā yasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1590_1: kāle homi, tadā. Saccena lokaṃ pālesinti attano avisaṃvādibhāvena sattalokaṃ jambudīpe
atk-s0512a0:1590_2: tattha tattha sattanikāyaṃ pāpato nānāvidhā anatthato ca rakkhiṃ. Samaggaṃ janamakāsahanti
atk-s0512a0:1590_3: tattha tattha kalahaviggahavivādāpannaṃ mahājanaṃ kalahe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā sāmaggiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1591_0: Tadā hi bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0512a0:1591_1: “sacco”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa
atk-s0512a0:1591_2: santike sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā nacirasseva sabbasippānaṃ nipphattiṃ patto. Ācariyena anuññāto
atk-s0512a0:1591_3: bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tehi abhinandiyamāno tesaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1591_4: katipāhaṃ tesaṃ santike vasi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro patirūpena dārena saṃyojetukāmā
atk-s0512a0:1592_0: Mahāsatto nekkhammajjhāsayo attano nekkhammapāramiṃ paribrūhetukāmo gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1592_1: pabbajjāya ānisaṃsañca nānappakārato kathetvā mātāpitūnaṃ assumukhānaṃ rodamānānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1592_2: aparimāṇaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ anantaṃ yasaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahānāgova
atk-s0512a0:1592_3: ayasaṅkhalikaṃ gharabandhanaṃ chindanto nikkhamitvā himavantappadesaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1592_4: pabbajitvā vanamūlaphalāphalehi yāpento nacirasseva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo
atk-s0512a0:1593_0: So ekadivasaṃ dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento addasa sakalajambudīpe manusse yebhuyyena
atk-s0512a0:1593_2: Disvā evaṃ cintesi – “na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yadidaṃ ime satte evaṃ pāpapasute
atk-s0512a0:1593_3: vivādāpanne ca disvā ajjhupekkhaṇaṃ. Ahañhi ‘satte saṃsārapaṅkato uddharitvā nibbānathale
atk-s0512a0:1593_4: patiṭṭhapessāmī’ti mahāsambodhiyānaṃ paṭipanno, tasmā taṃ paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādento
atk-s0512a0:1593_5: yaṃnūnāhaṃ manussapathaṃ gantvā te te satte pāpato oramāpeyyaṃ, vivādañca nesaṃ vūpasameyya”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1594_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā mahāsatto mahākaruṇāya samussāhito santaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0512a0:1594_1: iddhiyā tattha tattha gantvā tesaṃ cittānukūlaṃ dhammaṃ desento kalahaviggahavivādāpanne
atk-s0512a0:1594_2: satte diṭṭhadhammikañca samparāyikañca virodhe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā aññamaññaṃ samagge
atk-s0512a0:1594_3: sahite akāsi. Anekākāravokārañca pāpe ādīnavaṃ vibhāvento tato satte vivecetvā ekacce
atk-s0512a0:1594_4: dasasu kusalakammapathadhammesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Ekacce pabbājetvā sīlasaṃvare indriyaguttiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1594_5: satisampajaññe pavivekavāse jhānābhiññāsu ca yathārahaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1598: Idhāpi mahāpurisassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā guṇānubhāvā ca vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1601_0: 72. Navame magadhe vaṭṭapotakotiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – magadharaṭṭhe aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1601_1: araññappadese vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā aciranikkhantatāya taruṇo
atk-s0512a0:1601_2: maṃsapesibhūto, tato eva ajātapakkho vaṭṭakacchāpako yadā ahaṃ kulāvakeyeva homi.
atk-s0512a0:1602_0: 73. Mukhatuṇḍakenāharitvāti mayhaṃ mātā attano mukhatuṇḍakena kālena kālaṃ gocaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1602_1: āharitvā maṃ poseti. Tassā phassena jīvāmīti parisedanatthañceva paribhāvanatthañca
atk-s0512a0:1602_2: sammadeva kālena kālaṃ mamaṃ adhisayanavasena phusantiyā tassā mama mātuyā sarīrasamphassena
atk-s0512a0:1602_3: jīvāmi viharāmi attabhāvaṃ pavattemi. Natthi me kāyikaṃ balanti mayhaṃ pana atitaruṇatāya
atk-s0512a0:1603_0: 74. Saṃvacchareti saṃvacchare saṃvacchare. Gimhasamayeti gimhakāle. Sukkharukkhasākhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1603_1: aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanasamuppannena agginā tasmiṃ padese davaḍāho padippati pajjalati,
atk-s0512a0:1603_2: so tathā padīpito. Upagacchati amhākanti mayhaṃ mātāpitūnañcāti amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānappadesaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1603_3: attano patiṭṭhānassa asuddhassāpi suddhabhāvakaraṇena pāvanato pāvakoti ca gatamagge
atk-s0512a0:1603_4: indhanassa bhasmabhāvāvahanato kaṇhavattanīti ca laddhanāmo aggi vanarukkhagacche
atk-s0512a0:1604_0: 75. Evaṃ upagamanato tadāpi saddāyantoti “dhamadhama”iti evaṃ saddaṃ karonto, anuravadassanañhetaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1604_1: dāvaggino. Mahāsikhīti pabbatakūṭasadisānaṃ indhanānaṃ vasena mahatiyo sikhā etassāti
atk-s0512a0:1604_2: mahāsikhī. Anupubbena anukkamena taṃ araññappadesaṃ jhāpento dahanto aggi mama samīpaṭṭhānaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0512a0:1605_0: 76. Aggivegabhayāti vegena āgacchato aggino bhayena bhītā. Tasitāti cittutrāsasamuṭṭhitena
atk-s0512a0:1605_1: kāyassa chambhitattena ca utrāsā. Mātāpitāti mātāpitaro. Attānaṃ parimocayunti agginā
atk-s0512a0:1605_2: anupaddutaṭṭhānagamanena attano sotthibhāvamakaṃsu. Mahāsatto hi tadā mahāgeṇḍukappamāṇo
atk-s0512a0:1605_3: mahāsarīro ahosi. Taṃ mātāpitaro kenaci upāyena gahetvā gantuṃ asakkuṇantā attasinehena
atk-s0512a0:1606_0: 77. Pāde pakkhe pajahāmīti attano ubho pāde ubho pakkhe ca bhūmiyaṃ ākāse ca gamanasajje
atk-s0512a0:1606_1: karonto pasāremi iriyāmi vāyamāmi. “Paṭīhāmī”tipi pāṭho, vehāsagamanayogge kātuṃ
atk-s0512a0:1606_2: īhāmīti attho. “Patīhāmī”tipi paṭhanti. Tassattho – pāde pakkhe ca pati visuṃ īhāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1606_3: gamanatthaṃ vāyamāmi, taṃ pana vāyāmakaraṇatthameva. Kasmā? Yasmā natthi me kāyikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1606_4: balaṃ. Sohaṃ agatiko tatthāti so ahaṃ evaṃbhūto pādapakkhavekallena gamanavirahito
atk-s0512a0:1606_5: mātāpitūnaṃ apagamanena vā appaṭisaraṇo, tattha dāvaggiupaddute vane, tasmiṃ vā kulāvake
atk-s0512a0:1606_6: ṭhitova evaṃ idāni vattabbākārena tadā cintesiṃ. Dutiyañcettha ahanti nipātamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1609_0: Tattha yesāhaṃ upadhāveyyaṃ, bhīto tasitavedhitoti maraṇabhayena bhīto tato eva cittutrāsena
atk-s0512a0:1609_1: tasito sarīrakampanena vedhito yesamahaṃ pakkhantaraṃ etarahi dāvaggiupadduto jaladuggaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1609_2: viya maññamāno pavisituṃ upadhāveyyaṃ te mama mātāpitaro maṃ ekakaṃ eva ohāya jahitvā
atk-s0512a0:1609_3: pakkantā. Kathaṃ me ajja kātaveti kathaṃ nu kho mayā ajja kātabbaṃ, paṭipajjitabbanti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1610_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto itikattabbatāsammūḷho hutvā ṭhito puna cintesi – “imasmiṃ loke sīlaguṇo
atk-s0512a0:1610_1: nāma atthi, saccaguṇo nāma atthi, atīte pāramiyo pūretvā bodhitale nisīditvā abhisambuddhā
atk-s0512a0:1610_3: sabbasattesu samappavattamettābhāvanā sabbaññubuddhā nāma atthi, tehi ca paṭividdho
atk-s0512a0:1610_4: ekantaniyyānaguṇo dhammo atthi, mayi cāpi ekaṃ saccaṃ atthi. Saṃvijjamāno eko sabhāvadhammo
atk-s0512a0:1610_5: paññāyati, tasmā atītabuddhe ceva tehi paṭividdhaguṇe ca āvajjetvā mayi vijjamānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1610_6: saccaṃ sabhāvadhammaṃ gahetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā aggiṃ paṭikkamāpetvā ajja mayā attano
atk-s0512a0:1610_7: ceva idha vāsīnaṃ sesapāṇīnañca sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā
atk-s0512a0:1610_8: mahāsatto attano ānubhāve ṭhatvā yathācintitaṃ paṭipajji. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1617_0: 81. Tattha mahāsatto atīte parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇe āvajjetvā attani vijjamānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1617_1: saccasabhāvaṃ ārabbha yaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā tadā saccakiriyamakāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ “santi
atk-s0512a0:1618_0: Tattha santi pakkhā apatanāti mayhaṃ pakkhā nāma atthi upalabbhanti, no ca kho sakkā
atk-s0512a0:1618_1: etehi uppatituṃ ākāsena gantunti apatanā. Santi pādā avañcanāti pādāpi me atthi,
atk-s0512a0:1618_2: tehi pana vañcituṃ padavāragamanena gantuṃ na sakkāti avañcanā. Mātāpitā ca nikkhantāti
atk-s0512a0:1618_3: ye maṃ aññattha neyyuṃ, tepi maraṇabhayena mama mātāpitaro nikkhantā. Jātavedāti
atk-s0512a0:1618_4: aggiṃ ālapati. So hi jātova vediyati, dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā “jātavedo”ti
atk-s0512a0:1618_5: vuccati. Paṭikkamāti paṭigaccha nivattāti jātavedaṃ āṇāpeti.
atk-s0512a0:1619_0: Iti mahāsatto “sace mayhaṃ pakkhānaṃ atthibhāvo, te ca pasāretvā ākāse apatanabhāvo,
atk-s0512a0:1619_1: pādānaṃ atthibhāvo, te ca ukkhipitvā avañcanabhāvo, mātāpitūnaṃ maṃ kulāvakeyeva
atk-s0512a0:1619_2: chaḍḍetvā palātabhāvo ca saccasabhāvabhūto eva, jātaveda, etena saccena tvaṃ ito
atk-s0512a0:1619_3: paṭikkamā”ti kulāvake nipannova saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Tassa saha saccakiriyāya soḷasakarīsamatte
atk-s0512a0:1619_4: ṭhāne jātavedo paṭikkami. Paṭikkamanto ca na jhāyamānova araññaṃ gato, udake pana
atk-s0512a0:1619_5: opilāpitaukkā viya tattheva nibbāyi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1622: Vajjesi soḷasakarīsāni, udakaṃ patvā yathā sikhī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1623_0: Sā panesā bodhisattassa vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ tasmiṃ samaye buddhaguṇānaṃ āvajjanapubbikā
atk-s0512a0:1623_1: saccakiriyā anaññasādhāraṇāti āha “saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1623_2: Teneva hi tassa ṭhānassa sakalepi imasmiṃ kappe agginā anabhibhavanīyattā taṃ kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1624: Evaṃ mahāsatto saccakiriyavasena attano tattha vāsīnaṃ sattānañca sotthiṃ katvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0512a0:1625: Tadā mātāpitaro etarahi mātāpitaro ahesuṃ, vaṭṭakarājā pana lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1626_0: Tassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyopi yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā. Tathā dāvaggimhi
atk-s0512a0:1626_1: tathā bheravākārena avattharitvā āgacchante tasmiṃ vaye ekako hutvāpi sāradaṃ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0512a0:1626_2: saccādidhammaguṇe buddhaguṇe ca anussaritvā attano eva ānubhāvaṃ nissāya saccakiriyāya
atk-s0512a0:1626_3: tattha vāsīnampi sattānaṃ sotthibhāvāpādanādayo ānubhāvā vibhāvetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1629_0: 83. Dasame yadā homi, maccharājā mahāsareti atīte macchayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0512a0:1629_1: sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane pokkharaṇiṭṭhāne valligahanaparikkhitte ekasmiṃ mahāsare macchānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1629_2: catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjanato yadā ahaṃ rājā homi, macchagaṇaparivuto tattha paṭivasāmi
atk-s0512a0:1629_3: tadā. Uṇheti uṇhakāle gimhasamaye. Sūriyasantāpeti ādiccasantāpena. Sare udaka khīyathāti
atk-s0512a0:1629_4: tasmiṃ sare udakaṃ khīyittha chijjittha. Tasmiñhi raṭṭhe tadā devo na vassi, sassāni
atk-s0512a0:1629_5: milāyiṃsu, vāpiādīsu udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agamāsi, macchakacchapā kalalagahanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1629_6: pavisiṃsu. Tasmimpi sare macchā kaddamagahanaṃ pavisitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1630_0: 84. Tatoti tato udakaparikkhayato aparabhāge. Kulalasenakāti kulalāceva senā ca.
atk-s0512a0:1630_1: Bhakkhayanti divārattiṃ, macche upanisīdiyāti tattha tattha kalalapiṭṭhe upanisīditvā
atk-s0512a0:1630_2: kalalagahanaṃ pavisitvā nipanne macche kākā vā itare vā divā ceva rattiñca kaṇayaggasadisehi
atk-s0512a0:1630_3: tuṇḍehi koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā nīharitvā vipphandamāne bhakkhayanti.
atk-s0512a0:1631_0: 85. Atha mahāsatto macchānaṃ taṃ byasanaṃ disvā mahākaruṇāya samussāhitahadayo “ṭhapetvā
atk-s0512a0:1631_1: maṃ ime mama ñātake imasmā dukkhā mocetuṃ samattho nāma añño natthi, kena nu kho
atk-s0512a0:1631_2: ahaṃ upāyena te ito dukkhato moceyya”nti cintento “yaṃnūnāhaṃ pubbakehi mahesīhi
atk-s0512a0:1631_3: āciṇṇasamāciṇṇaṃ mayi ca saṃvijjamānaṃ saccadhammaṃ nissāya saccakiriyaṃ katvā devaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1631_4: vassāpetvā mama ñātisaṅghassa jīvitadānaṃ dadeyyaṃ, tena ca sakalassāpi āhārūpajīvino
atk-s0512a0:1631_5: sattalokassa mahāupakāro sampādito mayā”ti nicchayaṃ katvā devaṃ vassāpetuṃ saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1632_0: Tattha saha ñātīhi pīḷitoti mayhaṃ ñātīhi saddhiṃ tena udakaparikkhayena pīḷito.
atk-s0512a0:1632_1: Sahāti vā nipātamattaṃ. Mahākāruṇikatāya tena byasanena dukkhitehi ñātīhi kāraṇabhūtehi
atk-s0512a0:1633: 86. Dhammatthanti dhammabhūtaṃ atthaṃ, dhammato vā anapetaṃ atthaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Saccaṃ. Addasapassayanti mayhaṃ ñātīnañca apassayaṃ addasaṃ. Atikkhayanti mahāvināsaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1634_0: 87. Saddhammanti sataṃ sādhūnaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ekassāpi pāṇino ahiṃsanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1634_1: Anussaritvā. Paramatthaṃ vicintayanti taṃ kho pana paramatthaṃ saccaṃ aviparītasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1634_2: katvā cintayanto. Yaṃ loke dhuvasassatanti yadetaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ekassāpi
atk-s0512a0:1634_3: pāṇino ahiṃsanaṃ, taṃ sabbakālaṃ tathabhāvena dhuvaṃ sassataṃ vicintayaṃ saccakiriyaṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0512a0:1635_0: 88. Idāni taṃ dhammaṃ mahāsatto attani vijjamānaṃ gahetvā saccavacanaṃ payojetukāmo
atk-s0512a0:1635_1: kālavaṇṇaṃ kaddamaṃ dvidhā viyūhitvā añjanarukkhasāraghaṭikavaṇṇamahāsarīro sudhotalohitakamaṇisadisāni
atk-s0512a0:1635_2: akkhīni ummīletvā ākāsaṃ ullokento “yato sarāmi attāna”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0512a0:1636_0: Tattha yato sarāmi attānanti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi
atk-s0512a0:1636_1: anussarāmi. Yato pattosmi viññutanti yato paṭṭhāya tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu viññutaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1636_2: vijānanabhāvaṃ pattosmi, uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ito yāva mayhaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ anussaraṇasamatthatā
atk-s0512a0:1636_3: viññutappatti eva, etthantare samānajātikānaṃ khādanaṭṭhāne nibbattopi taṇḍulakaṇappamāṇampi
atk-s0512a0:1636_4: macchaṃ mayā na khāditapubbaṃ, aññampi kañci pāṇaṃ sañcicca hiṃsitaṃ bādhitaṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1637_0: 89. Etena saccavajjenāti “yadetaṃ mayā kassaci pāṇassa ahiṃsanaṃ vuttaṃ, sace etaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1637_1: saccaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ, etena saccavacanena pajjunno megho abhivassatu, ñātisaṅghaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1637_2: me dukkhā pamocetū”ti vatvā puna attano paricārikaceṭakaṃ āṇāpento viya pajjunnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1638_0: Tattha abhitthanaya pajjunnāti pajjunno vuccati megho, ayaṃ pana meghavasena laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1638_1: vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ ālapati. Ayaṃ hissa adhippāyo – devo nāma anabhitthanayanto
atk-s0512a0:1638_2: vijjulatā anicchārento pavassantopi na sobhati, tasmā tvaṃ abhitthanayanto vijjulatā
atk-s0512a0:1638_3: nicchārento vassāpehīti. Nidhiṃ kākassa nāsayāti kākā kalalaṃ pavisitvā ṭhite macche
atk-s0512a0:1638_4: tuṇḍena koṭṭetvā nīharitvā khādanti, tasmā tesaṃ antokalale macchā “nidhī”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0512a0:1638_5: Taṃ kākasaṅghassa nidhiṃ devaṃ vassāpento udakena paṭicchādetvā nāsehi. Kākaṃ sokāya
atk-s0512a0:1638_6: randhehīti kākasaṅgho imasmiṃ mahāsare udakena puṇṇe macche alabhamāno socissati,
atk-s0512a0:1638_7: taṃ kākagaṇaṃ tvaṃ imaṃ kaddamaṃ pūrento sokāya randhehi, sokassatthāya pana vassāpayatha,
atk-s0512a0:1638_8: yathā antonijjhānalakkhaṇaṃ sokaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ karohīti attho. Macche sokā pamocayāti
atk-s0512a0:1638_9: mama ñātake sabbeva macche imamhā maraṇasokā pamocehi. “Mañca sokā pamocayā”ti jātake
atk-s0512a0:1638_10: paṭhanti. Tattha ca-kāro sampiṇḍanattho, mañca mama ñātake cāti sabbeva maraṇasokā
atk-s0512a0:1638_11: pamocehi. Macchānañhi anudakabhāvena paccatthikānaṃ ghāsabhāvaṃ gacchāmāti mahāmaraṇasoko,
atk-s0512a0:1638_12: mahāsattassa pana tesaṃ anayabyasanaṃ paṭicca karuṇāyato karuṇāpatirūpamukhena sokasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1639_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto attano paricārikaceṭakaṃ āṇāpento viya pajjunnaṃ ālapitvā sakale
atk-s0512a0:1639_1: kosalaraṭṭhe mahāvassaṃ vassāpesi. Mahāsattassa hi sīlatejena saccakiriyāya samakālameva
atk-s0512a0:1639_2: sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So “kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1639_3: kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta, mahāpuriso maccharājā
atk-s0512a0:1639_4: ñātīnaṃ maraṇasokena vassāpanaṃ icchati, sakalaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ ekameghaṃ katvā vassāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1640_0: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ valāhakaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā meghagītaṃ gāyanto
atk-s0512a0:1640_1: pācīnalokadhātuabhimukho pakkhandi. Pācīnadisābhāge khalamaṇḍalamattaṃ ekaṃ meghamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1640_2: uṭṭhāya satapaṭalaṃ sahassapaṭalaṃ hutvā abhitthanayantaṃ vijjulatā nicchārentaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1640_3: adhomukhaṭhapitaudakakumbhākārena vissandamānaṃ sakalaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ mahoghena ajjhotthari.
atk-s0512a0:1640_4: Devo acchinnadhāraṃ vassanto muhutteneva taṃ mahāsaraṃ pūresi. Macchā maraṇabhayato
atk-s0512a0:1640_5: mucciṃsu. Kākādayo apatiṭṭhā ahesuṃ. Na kevalaṃ macchā eva, manussāpi vividhasassāni
atk-s0512a0:1640_6: sampādentā catuppadādayopīti sabbepi vassūpajīvino kāyikacetasikadukkhato mucciṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1644: Tattha khaṇena abhivassathāti adandhāyitvā saccakiriyakhaṇeneva abhivassi.
atk-s0512a0:1645_0: 91. Katvā vīriyamuttamanti deve avassante kiṃ kātabbanti kosajjaṃ anāpajjitvā ñātatthacariyāsampādanamukhena
atk-s0512a0:1645_1: mahato sattanikāyassa hitasukhanipphādanaṃ uttamaṃ vīriyaṃ katvā. Saccatejabalassito
atk-s0512a0:1645_2: mama saccānubhāvabalasannissito hutvā tadā mahāmeghaṃ vassāpesiṃ. Yasmā cetadevaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1645_3: tasmā “saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī”ti mahāmaccharājakāle attano saccapāramiyā
atk-s0512a0:1646: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahākaruṇāya samussāhitahadayo sakalaraṭṭhe mahāvassaṃ vassāpanavasena mahājanaṃ maraṇadukkhato mocetvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0512a0:1647: Tadā pajjunno ānandatthero ahosi, macchagaṇā buddhaparisā, maccharājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1648_0: Tassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyopi niddhāretabbā. Tathā attano samānajātikānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1648_1: khādanaṭṭhāne macchayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā taṇḍulakaṇamattampi macchaṃ ādiṃ katvā kassacipi
atk-s0512a0:1648_2: pāṇino akhādanaṃ, tiṭṭhatu khādanaṃ ekasattassapi aviheṭhanaṃ, tathā saccakaraṇena
atk-s0512a0:1648_3: devassa vassāpanaṃ, udake parikkhīṇe kalalagahane nimujjanavasena attanā anubhavamānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1648_4: dukkhaṃ vīrabhāvena agaṇetvā ñātisaṅghasseva taṃ dukkhaṃ attano hadaye katvā asahantassa
atk-s0512a0:1648_5: sabbabhāvena karuṇāyanā, tathā ca paṭipattīti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1651_0: 92. Ekādasame kaṇhadīpāyano isīti evaṃnāmako tāpaso. Bodhisatto hi tadā dīpāyano
atk-s0512a0:1651_1: nāma attano sahāyaṃ maṇḍabyatāpasaṃ sūle uttāsitaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa sīlaguṇena
atk-s0512a0:1651_2: taṃ avijahanto tiyāmarattiṃ sūlaṃ nissāya ṭhito tassa sarīrato paggharitvā patitapatitehi
atk-s0512a0:1651_3: lohitabindūhi sukkhehi kāḷavaṇṇasarīratāya “kaṇhadīpāyano”ti pākaṭo ahosi. Paropaññāsavassānīti
atk-s0512a0:1651_4: sādhikāni paññāsavassāni, accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Anabhirato cariṃ ahanti
atk-s0512a0:1651_5: pantasenāsanesu ceva adhikusaladhammesu ca anabhirativāsaṃ vasanto ahaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1651_6: acariṃ. Pabbajitvā sattāhameva hi tadā mahāsatto abhirato brahmacariyaṃ cari. Tato
atk-s0512a0:1652_0: Kasmā pana mahāpuriso anekasatasahassesu attabhāvesu nekkhammajjhāsayo brahmacariyavāsaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1652_1: abhiramitvā idha taṃ nābhirami? Puthujjanabhāvassa cañcalabhāvato. Kasmā ca puna
atk-s0512a0:1652_2: na agāraṃ ajjhāvasīti? Paṭhamaṃ nekkhammajjhāsayena kāmesu dosaṃ disvā pabbaji. Athassa
atk-s0512a0:1652_3: ayonisomanasikārena anabhirati uppajji. So taṃ vinodetumasakkontopi kammañca phalañca
atk-s0512a0:1652_4: saddahitvā tāva mahantaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya agārasmā nikkhamanto yaṃ pajahi, puna tadatthameva
atk-s0512a0:1652_5: nivatto, “eḷamūgo capalo vatāyaṃ kaṇhadīpāyano”ti imaṃ apavādaṃ jigucchanto attano
atk-s0512a0:1652_6: hirottappabhedabhayena. Api ca pabbajjāpuññaṃ nāmetaṃ viññūhi buddhādīhi pasatthaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1652_7: tehi ca anuṭṭhitaṃ, tasmāpi sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukho rodamānopi
atk-s0512a0:1652_8: brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasi, na taṃ vissajjesi. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1653: “Saddhāya nikkhamma puna nivatto, so eḷamūgo capalo vatāyaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1654: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako carāmi brahmacariyaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1655: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ, evampahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1656_0: 93. Na koci etaṃ jānātīti etaṃ mama anabhiratimanaṃ brahmacariyavāse abhirativirahitacittaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1656_1: koci manussabhūto na jānāti. Kasmā? Ahañhi kassaci nācikkhiṃ mama mānase citte arati
atk-s0512a0:1656_2: carati pavattatīti kassacipi na kathesiṃ, tasmā na koci manussabhūto etaṃ jānātīti.
atk-s0512a0:1661_0: Sabrahmacārīti tāpasapabbajjāya samānasikkhatāya sabrahmacārī. Maṇḍabyoti evaṃnāmako.
atk-s0512a0:1661_1: Sahāyoti gihikāle pabbajitakāle ca daḷhamittatāya piyasahāyo. Mahāisīti mahānubhāvo
atk-s0512a0:1661_2: isi. Pubbakammasamāyutto, sūlamāropanaṃ labhīti katokāsena attano pubbakammena yutto
atk-s0512a0:1662_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – atīte vaṃsaraṭṭhe kosambiyaṃ kosambiko nāma rājā rajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1662_1: kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ nigame asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa
atk-s0512a0:1662_2: putto hutvā nibbatti, nāmena dīpāyano nāma. Tādisasseva brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto
atk-s0512a0:1662_3: brāhmaṇakumāro tassa piyasahāyo ahosi, nāmena maṇḍabyo nāma. Te ubhopi aparabhāge
atk-s0512a0:1662_4: mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kāmesu dosaṃ disvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā kāme pahāya ñātimittaparijanassa
atk-s0512a0:1662_5: rodantassa paridevantassa nikkhamitvā himavantappadese assamaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya
atk-s0512a0:1662_6: vanamūlaphalāhārena yāpento paropaṇṇāsavassāni vasiṃsu, kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetuṃ
atk-s0512a0:1663_0: Te loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā kāsiraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. Tatrekasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1663_1: nigame dīpāyanassa gihisahāyo maṇḍabyo nāma paṭivasati. Te ubhopi tassa santikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1663_2: upasaṅkamiṃsu. So te disvā attamano paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0512a0:1663_3: Te tattha tīṇi cattāri vassāni vasitvā taṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ carantā bārāṇasisamīpe
atk-s0512a0:1663_4: atimuttakasusāne vasiṃsu. Tattha dīpāyano yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā puna tasmiṃ nigame
atk-s0512a0:1663_5: maṇḍabyassa attano sahāyassa santikaṃ gato. Maṇḍabyatāpaso tattheva vasi.
atk-s0512a0:1664_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko coro antonagare corikaṃ katvā dhanasāraṃ ādāya nikkhanto paṭibuddhehi
atk-s0512a0:1664_1: gehasāmikehi nagarārakkhakamanussehi ca anubaddho niddhamanena nikkhamitvā vegena
atk-s0512a0:1664_2: susānaṃ pavisitvā tāpasassa paṇṇasāladvāre bhaṇḍikaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyi. Manussā bhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1664_3: disvā “are duṭṭhajaṭila, rattiṃ, corikaṃ katvā divā tāpasavesena carasī”ti tajjetvā
atk-s0512a0:1664_4: pothetvā taṃ ādāya rañño dassayiṃsu. Rājā anupaparikkhitvāva “sūle uttāsethā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1664_5: Taṃ susānaṃ netvā khadirasūle āropayiṃsu. Tāpasassa sarīre sūlaṃ na pavisati. Tato
atk-s0512a0:1664_6: nimbasūlaṃ āhariṃsu, tampi na pavisati. Tato ayasūlaṃ āhariṃsu, tampi na pavisati.
atk-s0512a0:1664_7: Tāpaso “kiṃ nu kho me pubbakamma”nti cintesi. Tassa jātissarañāṇaṃ uppajji. Tena
atk-s0512a0:1664_8: pubbakammaṃ addasa – so kira purimattabhāve vaḍḍhakīputto hutvā pitu rukkhatacchanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1664_9: gantvā ekaṃ makkhikaṃ gahetvā koviḷārasakalikāya sūlena viya vijjhi. Tassa taṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1664_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhi. So “na sakkā ito pāpato muccitu”nti ñatvā rājapurise
atk-s0512a0:1664_11: āha – “sace maṃ sūle uttāsetukāmattha, koviḷārasūlaṃ āharathā”ti. Te tathā katvā
atk-s0512a0:1664_12: taṃ sūle uttāsetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1665_0: Tadā kaṇhadīpāyano “ciradiṭṭho me sahāyo”ti maṇḍabyassa santikaṃ āgacchanto taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1665_1: sutvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ, samma, kārakosī”ti pucchitvā “akārakomhī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1665_2: vutte “attano manopadosaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkhi na sakkhī”ti pucchi. “Samma, yehi ahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1665_3: gahito, neva tesaṃ na rañño upari mayhaṃ manopadoso atthī”ti. “Evaṃ sante tādisassa
atk-s0512a0:1665_4: sīlavato chāyā mayhaṃ sukhā”ti vatvā kaṇhadīpāyano sūlaṃ nissāya nisīdi. Ārakkhakapurisā
atk-s0512a0:1665_5: taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā “anisāmetvā me kata”nti vegena tattha gantvā “kasmā,
atk-s0512a0:1665_6: bhante, tvaṃ sūlaṃ nissāya nisinnosī”ti dīpāyanaṃ pucchi. “Mahārāja, imaṃ tāpasaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1665_7: rakkhanto nisinnosmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ imassa kārakabhāvaṃ ñatvā evaṃ karosī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1665_8: So kammassa avisodhitabhāvaṃ ācikkhi. Athassa dīpāyano “raññā nāma nisammakārinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1666: “Alaso gihī kāmabhogī na sādhu, asaññato pabbajito na sādhu;
atk-s0512a0:1667: Rājā na sādhu anisammakārī, yo paṇḍito kodhano taṃ na sādhū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1669_0: Rājā maṇḍabyatāpasassa niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sūlaṃ harathā”ti āṇāpesi. Sūlaṃ harantā
atk-s0512a0:1669_1: harituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Maṇḍabyo āha – “mahārāja, ahaṃ pubbe katakammadosena evarūpaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1669_2: ayasaṃ patto, mama sarīrato sūlaṃ harituṃ na sakkā, sacepi mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ dātukāmo,
atk-s0512a0:1669_3: kakacena imaṃ sūlaṃ cammasamaṃ katvā chindāpehī”ti. Rājā tathā kāresi. Sūlaṃ antoyeva
atk-s0512a0:1669_4: ahosi, na kañci pīḷaṃ janesi. Tadā kira sukhumaṃ sakalikahīraṃ gahetvā makkhikāya
atk-s0512a0:1669_5: vaccamaggaṃ pavesesi, taṃ tassa anto eva ahosi. So tena kāraṇena amaritvā, attano
atk-s0512a0:1669_6: āyukkhayeneva mari, tasmā ayampi na matoti. Rājā tāpase vanditvā khamāpetvā ubhopi
atk-s0512a0:1669_7: uyyāneyeva vasāpento paṭijaggi. Tato paṭṭhāya so āṇimaṇḍabyo nāma jāto. So rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1669_8: upanissāya tattheva vasi. Dīpāyano pana tassa vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ karitvā attano gihisahāyamaṇḍabyena
atk-s0512a0:1673_0: Tattha āpucchitvānāti mayhaṃ sahāyaṃ maṇḍabyatāpasaṃ āpucchitvā. Yaṃ mayhaṃ sakamassamanti
atk-s0512a0:1673_1: yaṃ taṃ mayhaṃ gihisahāyena maṇḍabyabrāhmaṇena kāritaṃ sakaṃ mama santakaṃ assamapadaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1674_0: 96. Taṃ pana paṇṇasālaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā sahāyassa ārocesuṃ. So sutvāva tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0512a0:1674_1: saputtadāro bahugandhamālaphāṇitādīni ādāya paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā dīpāyanaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0512a0:1674_2: pāde dhovitvā pānakaṃ pāyetvā āṇimaṇḍabyassa pavattiṃ suṇanto nisīdi. Athassa putto
atk-s0512a0:1674_3: yaññadattakumāro nāma caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ geṇḍukena kīḷi. Tattha cekasmiṃ vammike āsiviso
atk-s0512a0:1674_4: vasati. Kumārena bhūmiyaṃ pahatageṇḍuko gantvā vammikabile āsivisassa matthake pati.
atk-s0512a0:1675_0: Atha naṃ kuddho āsiviso hatthe ḍaṃsi. So visavegena mucchito tattheva pati. Athassa
atk-s0512a0:1675_1: mātāpitaro sappena daṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā kumāraṃ ukkhipitvā tāpasassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:1675_2: “bhante, osadhena vā mantena vā puttakaṃ no nīrogaṃ karothā”ti āhaṃsu. So “ahaṃ osadhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1675_3: na jānāmi, nāhaṃ vejjakammaṃ karissāmi, pabbajitomhī”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1675_4: kumārake mettaṃ katvā saccakiriyaṃ karothā”ti. Tāpaso “sādhu saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1675_5: vatvā yaññadattassa sīse hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “sahāyo
atk-s0512a0:1677_1: geṇḍukakīḷaṃ kīḷantoti attho. Āsivisamakopayīti bhūmiyaṃ paṭihato hutvā vammikabilagatena
atk-s0512a0:1677_2: geṇḍukena tattha ṭhitaṃ kaṇhasappaṃ sīse paharitvā rosesi.
atk-s0512a0:1678: 98. Vaṭṭagataṃ maggaṃ, anvesantoti tena vaṭṭena gataṃ maggaṃ gavesanto. Āsivisassa hatthena, uttamaṅgaṃ parāmasīti vammikabilaṃ pavesitena attano hatthena āsīvisassa sīsaṃ phusi.
atk-s0512a0:1679: 99. Visabalassitoti visabalanissito attano visavegaṃ nissāya uppajjanakasappo. Aḍaṃsi dārakaṃ khaṇeti tasmiṃ parāmasitakkhaṇe eva taṃ brāhmaṇakumāraṃ ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0512a0:1680_0: 100. Sahadaṭṭhoti ḍaṃsena saheva, daṭṭhasamakālameva. Āsivisenāti ghoravisena. Tenāti
atk-s0512a0:1680_1: tena dārakassa visavegena mucchitassa bhūmiyaṃ patanena ahaṃ dukkhito ahosiṃ. Mama
atk-s0512a0:1680_2: vāhasi taṃ dukkhanti taṃ dārakassa mātāpitūnañca dukkhaṃ mama vāhasi, mayhaṃ sarīre
atk-s0512a0:1681_0: 101. Tyāhanti te tassa dārakassa mātāpitaro ahaṃ “mā socatha, mā paridevathā”tiādinā
atk-s0512a0:1681_1: nayena samassāsetvā. Sokasalliteti sokasallavante. Agganti seṭṭhaṃ tato eva varaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1682: 102. Idāni taṃ saccakiriyaṃ sarūpena dassetuṃ “sattāhamevā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0512a0:1683_0: Tattha sattāhamevāti pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya satta ahāni eva. Pasannacittoti kammaphalasaddhāya
atk-s0512a0:1683_1: pasannamānaso. Puññatthikoti puññena atthiko, dhammacchandayutto. Athāparaṃ yaṃ caritanti
atk-s0512a0:1683_2: atha tasmā sattāhā uttari yaṃ mama brahmacariyacaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1684_0: 103. Akāmakovāhīti pabbajjaṃ anicchanto eva. Etena saccena suvatthi hotūti sace atirekapaññāsavassāni
atk-s0512a0:1684_1: anabhirativāsaṃ vasantena mayā kassaci ajānāpitabhāvo sacco, etena saccena yaññadattakumārassa
atk-s0512a0:1685_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsattena saccakiriyāya katāya yaññadattassa sarīrato visaṃ bhassitvā
atk-s0512a0:1685_1: pathaviṃ pāvisi. Kumāro akkhīni ummīletvā mātāpitaro oloketvā “amma, tātā”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a0:1689_0: Tassattho – mama saccakaraṇena saha samānakālameva tato pubbe visavegena vedhito
atk-s0512a0:1689_1: kampito visaññibhāvena abujjhitvā ṭhito vigatavisattā paṭiladdhasañño sahasā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1689_2: So māṇavo kumāro visavegābhāvena arogo ca ahosīti.
atk-s0512a0:1690_0: Idāni satthā tassā attano saccakiriyāya paramatthapāramibhāvaṃ dassento “saccena
atk-s0512a0:1690_1: me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī”ti āha. Taṃ uttānatthameva. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1690_2: pana “mahāsattassa saccakiriyāya kumārassa thanappadesato uddhaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā
atk-s0512a0:1690_3: vigataṃ. Dārakassa pitu saccakiriyāya kaṭito uddhaṃ, mātu saccakiriyāya avasiṭṭhasarīrato
atk-s0512a0:1690_4: visaṃ bhassitvā vigata”nti āgataṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1691: “Yasmā dānaṃ nābhinandiṃ kadāci, disvānahaṃ atithiṃ vāsakāle;
atk-s0512a0:1692: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ aveduṃ, bahussutā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0512a0:1693: Akāmako vāpi ahaṃ dadāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu;
atk-s0512a0:1695: “Āsīviso tāta pahūtatejo, yo taṃ adaṃsī patarā udicca;
atk-s0512a0:1696: Tasmiñca me appiyatāya ajja, pitari ca te natthi koci viseso;
atk-s0512a0:1697: Etena saccena suvatthi hotu, hataṃ visaṃ jīvatu yaññadatto”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1698_0: Tattha vāsakāleti vasanatthāya gehaṃ āgatakāle. Na cāpi me appiyataṃ avedunti bahussutāpi
atk-s0512a0:1698_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇā ayaṃ neva dānaṃ abhinandati, na amheti imaṃ mama appiyabhāvaṃ neva
atk-s0512a0:1698_2: jāniṃsu. Ahañhi te piyacakkhūhiyeva olokemīti dīpeti. Etena saccenāti sace ahaṃ dadamānopi
atk-s0512a0:1698_3: vipākaṃ asaddahitvā attano anicchāya demi, anicchabhāvañca me pare na jānanti, etena
atk-s0512a0:1698_4: saccena suvatthi hotūti attho. Itaragāthāya, tātāti puttaṃ ālapati. Pahūtatejoti
atk-s0512a0:1698_5: balavaviso. Patarāti padarā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Udiccāti uddhaṃ gantvā, vammikabilato
atk-s0512a0:1698_6: uṭṭhahitvāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tāta yaññadatta, tasmiñca āsivise tava ca
atk-s0512a0:1698_7: pitari appiyabhāvena mayhaṃ koci viseso natthi, tañca pana appiyabhāvaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0512a0:1698_8: ajja mayā na koci jānāpitapubbo, sace etaṃ saccaṃ, etena saccena suvatthi hotūti.
atk-s0512a0:1699_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto kumāre aroge jāte tassa pitaraṃ “dānaṃ dadantena nāma kammañca phalañca
atk-s0512a0:1699_1: saddahitvā dātabba”nti kammaphalasaddhāya nivesetvā sayaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā jhānābhiññāyo
atk-s0512a0:1700: Tadā maṇḍabyo ānandatthero ahosi, tassa bhariyā visākhā, putto rāhulatthero, āṇimaṇḍabyo sāriputtatthero, kaṇhadīpāyano lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1701: Tassa idha pāḷiyā āruḷhā saccapāramī, sesā ca pāramiyo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva niddhāretabbā. Tathā anavasesamahābhogapariccāgādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1704_0: 105. Dvādasame sutasomo mahīpatīti evaṃnāmo khattiyo. Mahāsatto hi tadā kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0512a0:1704_1: indapatthanagare korabyassa rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Taṃ sutavittatāya
atk-s0512a0:1704_2: candasamānasommavaravaṇṇatāya ca “sutasomo”ti sañjāniṃsu. Taṃ vayappattaṃ sabbasippanipphattippattaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1704_3: mātāpitaro rajje abhisiñciṃsu. Gahito porisādenāti purisānaṃ manussānaṃ adanato khādanato
atk-s0512a0:1705_0: Bārāṇasirājā hi tadā maṃsaṃ vinā abhuñjanto aññaṃ maṃsaṃ alabhantena bhattakārakena
atk-s0512a0:1705_1: manussamaṃsaṃ khādāpito rasataṇhāya baddho hutvā manusse ghātetvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto
atk-s0512a0:1705_2: “porisādo”ti laddhanāmo amaccapārisajjappamukhehi nāgarehi negamajānapadehi ca ussāhitena
atk-s0512a0:1705_3: kāḷahatthinā nāma attano senāpatinā “deva, yadi rajjena atthiko manussamaṃsakhādanato
atk-s0512a0:1705_4: viramāhī”ti vutto “rajjaṃ pajahantopi manussamaṃsakhādanato na oramissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a0:1705_5: tehi raṭṭhā pabbājito araññaṃ pavisitvā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhamūle vasanto khāṇuppahārena
atk-s0512a0:1705_6: pāde jātassa vaṇassa phāsubhāvāya “sakalajambudīpe ekasatakhattiyānaṃ galalohitena
atk-s0512a0:1705_7: balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti devatāya āyācanaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ anāhāratāya vaṇe phāsuke
atk-s0512a0:1705_8: jāte “devatānubhāvena me sotthi ahosī”ti saññāya “devatāya balikammatthaṃ rājāno
atk-s0512a0:1705_9: ānessāmī”ti gacchanto atītabhave sahāyabhūtena yakkhena samāgantvā tena dinnamantabalena
atk-s0512a0:1706_0: Atha tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā taṃ balikammaṃ anicchantī “upāyena naṃ nisedhessāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1706_1: pabbajitarūpena tassa attānaṃ dassetvā tena anubaddho tiyojanaṃ gantvā puna attano
atk-s0512a0:1706_2: dibbarūpameva dassetvā “tvaṃ musāvādī tayā ‘sakalajambudīpe rājāno ānetvā balikammaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1706_3: karissāmī’ti paṭissutaṃ. Idāni ye vā te vā dubbalarājāno ānesi. Jambudīpe jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1706_4: sutasomarājānaṃ sace nānessasi, na me te balikammena attho”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1707_0: So “diṭṭhā me attano devatā”ti tusitvā “sāmi, mā cintayi, ahaṃ ajjeva sutasomaṃ ānessāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1707_1: vatvā vegena migājinauyyānaṃ gantvā asaṃvihitāya ārakkhāya pokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā paduminipattena
atk-s0512a0:1707_2: sīsaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ antouyyānagateyeva balavapaccūse samantā tiyojanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1707_3: ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Mahāsatto pātova alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato caturaṅginiyā
atk-s0512a0:1707_4: senāya nagarato nikkhami. Tadā takkasilato nando nāma brāhmaṇo catasso satārahagāthāyo
atk-s0512a0:1707_5: gahetvā vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ atikkamma taṃ nagaraṃ patto rājānaṃ pācīnadvārena
atk-s0512a0:1707_6: nikkhamantaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā “jayatu bhavaṃ, mahārājā”ti vatvā jayāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1708_0: Rājā hatthinā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kuto nu, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, āgacchasi, kimicchasi, kiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1708_1: te dajja”nti āha. Brāhmaṇo “tumhe ‘sutavittakā’ti sutvā catasso satārahagāthāyo ādāya
atk-s0512a0:1708_2: tumhākaṃ desetuṃ āgatomhī”ti āha. Mahāsatto tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “ahaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a0:1708_3: nhāyitvā āgantvā sossāmi, tvaṃ mā ukkaṇṭhī”ti vatvā “gacchatha brāhmaṇassa asukagehe
atk-s0512a0:1708_4: nivāsaṃ ghāsacchādanañca saṃvidahathā”ti āṇāpetvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā mahantaṃ ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1708_5: saṃvidhāya oḷārikāni ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā massukammaṃ kāretvā ubbaṭṭitasarīro pokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0512a0:1708_6: rājavibhavena nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā udakaggahaṇasāṭake nivāsetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1709_0: Athassa gandhamālālaṅkāre upahariṃsu. Porisādo “alaṅkatakāle rājā bhāriko bhavissati,
atk-s0512a0:1709_1: sallahukakāleyeva naṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti nadanto khaggaṃ parivattento “ahamasmi porisādo”ti
atk-s0512a0:1709_2: nāmaṃ sāvetvā udakā nikkhami. Tassa saddaṃ sutvā hatthārohādayo hatthiādito bhassiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1709_3: Balakāyo dūre ṭhito tatova palāyi. Itaro attano āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā urena nipajji.
atk-s0512a0:1709_4: Porisādo rājānaṃ ukkhipitvā khandhe nisīdāpetvā sammukhaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1709_5: pākāraṃ laṅghitvā purato pagalitamadamattavaravāraṇe kumbhe akkamitvā pabbatakūṭāni
atk-s0512a0:1709_6: viya pātento vātajavānipi assaratanāni piṭṭhiyaṃ akkamitvā pātento rathasīse akkamitvā
atk-s0512a0:1709_7: pātento bhamarikaṃ bhamanto viya nīlakāni nigrodhapattāni maddanto viya ekavegeneva
atk-s0512a0:1709_8: tiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā kañci anubandhantaṃ adisvā saṇikaṃ gacchanto sutasomassa kesehi
atk-s0512a0:1709_9: udakabindūni attano upari patantāni “assubindūnī”ti saññāya “kimidaṃ sutasomopi maraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1710_0: Mahāsatto “nāhaṃ maraṇato anusocāmi, kuto rodanā, api ca kho saṅgaraṃ katvā saccāpanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1710_1: nāma paṇḍitānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, taṃ na nipphajjatī”ti anusocāmi. Kassapadasabalena desitā
atk-s0512a0:1710_2: catasso satārahagāthāyo ādāya takkasilato āgatassa brāhmaṇassa āgantukavattaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0512a0:1710_3: “nhāyitvā āgantvā suṇissāmi, yāva mamāgamanā āgamehī”ti saṅgaraṃ katvā uyyānaṃ gato,
atk-s0512a0:1710_4: tvañca tā gāthāyo sotuṃ adatvā maṃ gaṇhīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1712: Tattha brāhmaṇe saṅgaraṃ sarinti nandabrāhmaṇe attanā kataṃ paṭiññaṃ anussariṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1713_0: 106. Āvuṇitvā karattaleti tattha tattha uyyānādīsu gantvā attano balena ānītānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1713_1: ekasatakhattiyānaṃ hatthatale chiddaṃ katvā rukkhe lambanatthaṃ rajjuṃ paṭimuñcitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1713_2: Etesaṃ pamilāpetvāti ete ekasatakhattiye jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā uddhaṃpāde adhosire katvā
atk-s0512a0:1713_3: paṇhiyā sīsaṃ paharanto bhamaṇavasena hatthatale āvuṇitvā rukkhe ālambanavasena sabbaso
atk-s0512a0:1713_4: āhārūpacchedena ca sabbathā pamilāpetvā visosetvā khedāpetvāti attho. Yaññattheti
atk-s0512a0:1713_5: balikammatthe sādhetabbe. Upanayī mamanti maṃ upanesi.
atk-s0512a0:1714_0: 107. Tathā upanīyamāno pana mahāsatto porisādena “kiṃ tvaṃ maraṇato bhāyasī”ti vutte
atk-s0512a0:1714_1: “nāhaṃ maraṇato bhāyāmi, tassa pana brāhmaṇassa mayā kato saṅgaro na parimocito”ti
atk-s0512a0:1714_2: anusocāmi. “Sace maṃ vissajjessasi, taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tassa ca sakkārasammānaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a0:1714_3: puna āgamissāmī”ti. “Nāhamidaṃ saddahāmi, yaṃ tvaṃ mayā vissajjito gantvā puna mama
atk-s0512a0:1714_4: hatthaṃ āgamissāsī”ti. “Samma porisāda, mayā saddhiṃ ekācariyakule sikkhito sahāyo
atk-s0512a0:1714_5: hutvā ‘ahaṃ jīvitahetupi na musā kathemī’ti kiṃ na saddahasī”ti? Kiñcāpi me etena vācāmattakena –
atk-s0512a0:1715: “Asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi, sapathampi te samma ahaṃ karomi;
atk-s0512a0:1716: Tayā pamutto anaṇo bhavitvā, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissa”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:1717: Mahāsattena imāya gāthāya vuttāya porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomo ‘khattiyehi akattabbaṃ sapathaṃ karomī’ti vadati, gantvā anāgacchantopi mama hatthato na muccissatī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0512a0:1718: “Yo te kato saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0512a0:1719: Taṃ saṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇa sappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajassū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1721_0: Mahāsatto rāhumukhā mutto cando viya nāgabalo thāmasampanno khippameva taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1721_1: sampāpuṇi. Senāpissa “sutasomarājā paṇḍito, porisādaṃ dametvā sīhamukhā pamuttamattavaravāraṇo
atk-s0512a0:1721_2: viya āgamissatī”ti ca “rājānaṃ porisādassa datvā āgatā”ti garahabhayena ca bahinagareyeva
atk-s0512a0:1721_3: niviṭṭhā taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vanditvā “kaccittha, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:1721_4: porisādena na kilamito”ti paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “porisādena mayhaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1721_5: kataṃ, tathārūpo nāma caṇḍo sāhasiko mamaṃ saddahitvā maṃ vissajjesī”ti vutte rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1721_6: alaṅkaritvā hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā parivāretvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Taṃ disvā sabbe nāgarā tusiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1722_0: Sopi dhammasoṇḍatāya mātāpitaropi anupasaṅkamitvā nivesanaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:1722_1: tassa mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ katvā dhammagarutāya sayaṃ nīcāsane nisīditvā “tumhehi
atk-s0512a0:1722_2: mayhaṃ ābhatā satārahagāthā suṇomi ācariyā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo mahāsattena yācitakāle
atk-s0512a0:1722_3: gandhehi hatthe ubbaṭṭetvā pasibbakato manoramaṃ potthakaṃ nīharitvā ubhohi hatthehi
atk-s0512a0:1722_4: gahetvā “tena hi, mahārāja, suṇohī”ti potthakaṃ vācento gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0512a0:1724: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahusaṅgamo.
atk-s0512a0:1726: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0512a0:1727: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0512a0:1728: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0512a0:1729: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0512a0:1730: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1731_0: Tā sutvā mahāsatto “saphalaṃ me āgamana”nti tuṭṭhacitto “imā gāthā neva sāvakabhāsitā,
atk-s0512a0:1731_1: na isibhāsitā, na kavibhāsitā, na devabhāsitā, sabbaññunāva bhāsitā. Kiṃ nu kho aggha”nti
atk-s0512a0:1731_2: cintento “imaṃ sakalampi cakkavāḷaṃ yāva brahmalokā sattaratanapuṇṇaṃ katvā dinnepi
atk-s0512a0:1731_3: neva anucchavikaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti, ahaṃ kho panassa tiyojanasatike kururaṭṭhe sattayojanike
atk-s0512a0:1731_4: indapatthanagare rajjaṃ dātuṃ pahomi. Rajjaṃ kātuṃ panassa bhāgyaṃ natthi, tathā
atk-s0512a0:1731_5: hissa aṅgalakkhaṇānusārena appānubhāvatā dissati, tasmā dinnampi rajjaṃ na imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1731_6: tiṭṭhatī”ti cintetvā “ācariya, tumhe aññesaṃ khattiyānaṃ imā gāthāyo desetvā kiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1731_7: labhathā”ti pucchi. “Ekekāya sataṃ sataṃ, mahārāja, teneva satārahagāthā nāma jātā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1731_8: Athassa mahāsatto “tvaṃ ācariya, attanā gahetvā vicaraṇabhaṇḍassa agghaṃ na jānāsī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1733: Cattāri tvaṃ sahassāni, khippaṃ gaṇhāhi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1734_0: Cattāri sahassāni dāpetvā ekañca sukhayānakaṃ datvā mahatā sakkārasammāneneva taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1734_1: uyyojetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā “ahaṃ brāhmaṇena ābhataṃ saddhammaratanaṃ pūjetvā tassa
atk-s0512a0:1734_2: ca sakkārasammānaṃ katvā āgamissāmīti porisādassa paṭiññaṃ datvā āgato. Tattha yaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1734_3: brāhmaṇassa kattabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ taṃ kataṃ, idāni porisādassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1734_4: vutvā “tena hi, tāta sutasoma, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi, caturaṅginiyā senāya coraṃ gaṇhissāma,
atk-s0512a0:1734_5: mā gaccha corassa santika”nti yāciṃsu. Soḷasasahassā nāṭakitthiyo sesaparijanāpi
atk-s0512a0:1734_6: “amhe anāthe katvā kuhiṃ gacchasi devā”ti parideviṃsu. “Punapi kira rājā corassa
atk-s0512a0:1735_0: Mahāsatto “paṭiññāya saccāpanaṃ nāma sādhūnaṃ sappurisānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, sopi mamaṃ saddahitvā
atk-s0512a0:1735_1: vissajjesi, tasmā gamissāmiyevā”ti mātāpitaro vanditvā sesajanaṃ anusāsetvā assumukhena
atk-s0512a0:1735_2: nānappakāraṃ paridevantena itthāgārādinā janena anugato nagarā nikkhamma taṃ janaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1735_3: nivattetuṃ magge daṇḍakena tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā “imaṃ mama lekhaṃ mā atikkamiṃsū”ti
atk-s0512a0:1735_4: vatvā agamāsi. Mahājano tejavato mahāsattassa āṇaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto mahāsaddena
atk-s0512a0:1735_5: kanditvā roditvā nivatti. Bodhisatto āgatamaggeneva tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Tena
atk-s0512a0:1736_0: Tattha kiṃ tvaṃ icchasi nisajjanti tvaṃ attano nagaraṃ gantuṃ mama hatthato nissajjanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1736_1: kiṃ icchasi, tvaṃ “mayā takkasilādīsu ciraparicito saccavādī cā”ti vadasi, tasmā
atk-s0512a0:1736_2: yathā mati te kāhāmi, yathāruci te karissāmi. Yadi me tvaṃ punehisīti sace puna tvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1737_0: 108. Paṇhe āgamanaṃ mamāti pageva mama āgamanaṃ tassa porisādassa paṭissuṇitvā pātova
atk-s0512a0:1737_1: āgamissāmīti paṭissavaṃ katvā. Rajjaṃ niyyātayiṃ tadāti tadā porisādassa santikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1737_2: gantukāmo “idaṃ vo rajjaṃ paṭipajjathā”ti mātāpitūnaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1738_0: 109. Kasmā pana rajjaṃ niyyātayinti? Anussaritvā sataṃ dhammanti yasmā pana paṭiññāya
atk-s0512a0:1738_1: saccāpanaṃ nāma sataṃ sādhūnaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paveṇī kulavaṃso, tasmā taṃ saccapāramitādhammaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1738_2: pubbakaṃ porāṇaṃ jinehi buddhādīhi sevitaṃ anussaritvā saccaṃ anurakkhanto tassa
atk-s0512a0:1738_3: brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā porisādaṃ upāgamiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1739_0: 110. Natthi me saṃsayo tatthāti tasmiṃ porisādassa santikaṃ gamane “ayaṃ maṃ kiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1739_1: nu kho ghātessati, udāhu no”ti mayhaṃ saṃsayo natthi. “Caṇḍo sāhasiko mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1739_2: ekasatakhattiye devatāya balikammakaraṇasajjo ekanteneva ghātessatī”ti jānanto eva
atk-s0512a0:1739_3: kevalaṃ saccavācaṃ anurakkhanto attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā taṃ upāgamiṃ. Yasmā cetadevaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1739_4: tasmā saccena me samo natthi, esā me paramatthabhāvappattā saccapāramīti.
atk-s0512a0:1740_0: Upāgate pana mahāsatte vikasitapuṇḍarīkapadumasassirikamassa mukhaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vigatamaraṇabhayo
atk-s0512a0:1740_1: hutvā āgato, kissa nu kho esa ānubhāvo”ti cintento “tassa maññe dhammassa sutattā
atk-s0512a0:1740_2: ayaṃ evaṃ tejavā nibbhayo ca jāto, ahampi taṃ sutvā tejavā nibbhayo ca bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1740_3: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā porisādo mahāsattaṃ āha – “suṇoma satārahagāthāyo yāsaṃ savanatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1741: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “ayaṃ porisādo pāpadhammo, imaṃ thokaṃ niggahetvā lajjāpetvā kathessāmī”ti –
atk-s0512a0:1743: Natthi saccaṃ kuto dhammo, kiṃ sutena karissasī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1746: Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramate mano”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1747_0: Vutte “ayaṃ ativiya sañjātādaro sotukāmo, handassa kathessāmī”ti cintetvā “tena hi
atk-s0512a0:1747_1: samma, sādhukaṃ suṇohi manasikarohī”ti vatvā nandabrāhmaṇena kathitaniyāmeneva gāthānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1747_2: sakkaccaṃ thutiṃ katvā chakāmāvacaradevaloke ekakolāhalaṃ katvā devatāsu sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1749: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahusaṅgamo.
atk-s0512a0:1751: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0512a0:1752: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, attho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0512a0:1753: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0512a0:1754: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0512a0:1755: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1756_0: Dhammaṃ kathesi. Tassa tena sukathitattā ceva attano ca puññānubhāvena gāthā suṇantasseva
atk-s0512a0:1756_1: sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripūri. So bodhisatte muducitto hutvā “samma
atk-s0512a0:1756_2: sutasoma, dātabbayuttakaṃ hiraññādiṃ na passāmi, ekekāya gāthāya ekekaṃ varaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1756_3: āha. Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tvaṃ attanopi hitāni ajānanto parassa kiṃ nāma varaṃ dassasī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1756_4: apasādetvā puna tena “varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti yācito sabbapaṭhamaṃ “ahaṃ cirakālaṃ taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1756_5: arogaṃ passeyya”nti varaṃ yāci. So “ayaṃ idāni me vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa
atk-s0512a0:1756_6: mahānatthakarassa mayhameva jīvitamicchatī”ti tuṭṭhamānaso vañcetvā varassa gahitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1756_7: ajānanto adāsi. Mahāsatto hi upāyakusalatāya tassa ciraṃ jīvitukāmatāpadesena attano
atk-s0512a0:1756_8: jīvitaṃ yāci. Atha “parosataṃ khattiyānaṃ jīvitaṃ dehī”ti dutiyaṃ varaṃ, tesaṃ sake
atk-s0512a0:1756_9: raṭṭhe paṭipādanaṃ tatiyaṃ varaṃ, manussamaṃsakhādanato viramaṇaṃ catutthaṃ varaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1756_10: yāci. So tīṇi varāni datvā catutthaṃ varaṃ adātukāmo “aññaṃ varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvāpi
atk-s0512a0:1757_0: Atha bodhisatto porisādaṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā teneva rājāno mocāpetvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:1757_1: dārakānaṃ kaṇṇato suttavaṭṭi viya saṇikaṃ rajjuyo nīharitvā porisādena ekaṃ tacaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1757_2: āharāpetvā pāsāṇena ghaṃsitvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā tesaṃ hatthatalāni makkhesi. Taṅkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1757_3: eva phāsukaṃ ahosi. Dvīhatīhaṃ tattheva vasitvā te aroge kāretvā tehi saddhiṃ abhijjanakasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1757_4: mittasanthavaṃ kāretvā tehi saddhiṃ taṃ bārāṇasiṃ netvā rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā “appamattā
atk-s0512a0:1757_5: hothā”ti te rājāno attano attano nagaraṃ pesetvā indapatthanagarato āgatāya attano
atk-s0512a0:1757_6: caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto attano nagaraṃ gato tuṭṭhapamuditena nāgarajanena samparivāriyamāno
atk-s0512a0:1757_7: antepuraṃ pavisitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā mahātalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0512a0:1758_0: Atha mahāsatto cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ mahādānāni pavattento sīlāni paripūrento
atk-s0512a0:1758_1: uposathaṃ upavasanto pāramiyo anubrūhesi. Tepi rājāno mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni
atk-s0512a0:1759_0: Tadā porisādo aṅgulimālatthero ahosi, kāḷahatthiamacco sāriputtatthero, nandabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0512a0:1759_1: ānandatthero, rukkhadevatā mahākassapatthero, rājāno buddhaparisā, mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni,
atk-s0512a0:1760: Tassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyopi niddhāretabbā. Tathā alīnasattucariyāvaṇṇanāya (cariyā aṭṭha. 2.74 ādayo) viya mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1764_0: 111. Terasame sāmo yadā vane āsinti himavantasmiṃ migasammatāya nāma nadiyā tīre
atk-s0512a0:1764_1: mahati araññe sāmo nāma tāpasakumāro yadā ahosi. Sakkena abhinimmitoti sakkassa devānamindassa
atk-s0512a0:1764_2: upadesasampattiyā jātattā sakkena nibbattito janito. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – atīte
atk-s0512a0:1764_3: bārāṇasito avidūre nadiyā tīre eko nesādagāmo ahosi. Tattha jeṭṭhanesādassa putto
atk-s0512a0:1764_4: jāto. Tassa “dukūlo”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Tassā eva nadiyā paratīrepi eko nesādagāmo ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1764_5: Tattha jeṭṭhanesādassa dhītā jātā. Tassā “pārikā”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Te ubhopi brahmalokato
atk-s0512a0:1764_6: āgatā suddhasattā. Tesaṃ vayappattānaṃ anicchamānānaṃyeva āvāhavivāhaṃ kariṃsu. Te
atk-s0512a0:1764_7: ubhopi kilesasamuddaṃ anotaritvā brahmāno viya ekato vasiṃsu. Na ca kiñci nesādakammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0512a0:1765_0: Atha dukūlaṃ mātāpitaro “tāta, tvaṃ nesādakammaṃ na karosi, neva gharāvāsaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0512a0:1765_1: kiṃ nāma karissasī”ti āhaṃsu. So “tumhesu anujānantesu pabbajissāmī”ti āha. “Tena
atk-s0512a0:1765_2: hi pabbajāhī”ti. Dvepi janā himavantaṃ pavisitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne migasammatā nāma nadī
atk-s0512a0:1765_3: himavantato otaritvā gaṅgaṃ pattā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā gaṅgaṃ pahāya migasammatābhimukhā
atk-s0512a0:1765_4: abhiruhiṃsu. Tadā sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vissakammunā
atk-s0512a0:1765_5: tasmiṃ ṭhāne assamaṃ māpesi. Te tattha gantvā pabbajitvā sakkadattiye assame kāmāvacaramettaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1765_6: bhāvetvā paṭivasiṃsu. Sakkopi tesaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0512a0:1766_0: So ekadivasaṃ “tesaṃ cakkhū parihāyissantī”ti ñatvā upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, vo cakkhūnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1766_1: antarāyo paññāyati, paṭijagganakaṃ puttaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, jānāmi tumhākaṃ suddhacittataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1766_2: tasmā pārikāya utunikāle nābhiṃ hatthena parāmaseyyātha, evaṃ vo putto jāyissati,
atk-s0512a0:1766_3: so vo upaṭṭhahissatī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Dukūlapaṇḍito taṃ kāraṇaṃ pārikāya ācikkhitvā
atk-s0512a0:1766_4: tassā utunikāle nābhiṃ parāmasi. Tadā bodhisatto devalokā cavitvā tassā kucchimhi
atk-s0512a0:1766_5: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, sā dasamāsaccayena suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Tenevassa “suvaṇṇasāmo”ti
atk-s0512a0:1766_6: nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ aparabhāge vaḍḍhitvā soḷasavassuddesikampi mātāpitaro rakkhantā
atk-s0512a0:1767_0: Athekadivasaṃ vane phalāphalaṃ ādāya nivattitvā assamapadato avidūre meghe uṭṭhite
atk-s0512a0:1767_1: rukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā vammikamatthake ṭhitānaṃ sarīrato sedagandhamissake udake tasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1767_2: vammikabile ṭhitassa āsivisassa nāsāpuṭaṃ paviṭṭhe āsiviso kujjhitvā nāsāvātena pahari.
atk-s0512a0:1767_3: Dve andhā hutvā paridevamānā viraviṃsu. Atha mahāsatto “mama mātāpitaro aticirāyanti,
atk-s0512a0:1767_4: kā nu kho tesaṃ pavattī”ti paṭimaggaṃ gantvā saddamakāsi. Te tassa saddaṃ sañjānitvā
atk-s0512a0:1767_5: paṭisaddaṃ katvā puttasinehena “tāta sāma, idha paripantho atthi, mā āgamī”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a0:1767_6: saddānusārena sayameva samāgamiṃsu. So “kena vo kāraṇena cakkhūni vinaṭṭhānī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0512a0:1767_7: “tāta, mayaṃ na jānāma, deve vassante rukkhamūle vammikamatthake ṭhitā, atha na passāmā”ti
atk-s0512a0:1767_8: vuttamatte eva aññāsi “tattha āsivisena bhavitabbaṃ, tena kuddhena nāsāvāto vissaṭṭho bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1768_0: Atha “mā cintayittha, ahaṃ vo paṭijaggissāmī”ti mātāpitaro assamaṃ netvā tesaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādisañcaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a0:1768_1: rajjuke bandhi. Tato paṭṭhāya te assame ṭhapetvā vanamūlaphalāphalāni āharati, pātova
atk-s0512a0:1768_2: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjati, pānīyaṃ āharati, paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, dantakaṭṭhamukhodakāni
atk-s0512a0:1768_3: datvā madhuraphalāphalaṃ deti. Tehi mukhe vikkhālite sayaṃ paribhuñjitvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0512a0:1768_4: vanditvā tesaṃ avidūreyeva acchati – “kiṃ nu kho ime āṇāpentī”ti. Visesena ca mettaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1768_5: bahulamakāsi, tenassa sattā appaṭikkūlā ahesuṃ. Yathā cassa sattā, evaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1768_6: so bodhisatto appaṭikkūlo. Evaṃ so divase divase phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ gacchantopi
atk-s0512a0:1768_7: āgacchantopi migagaṇaparivuto eva ahosi. Sīhabyagghādivipakkhasattāpi tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1768_8: ativiya vissatthā, mettānubhāvena panassa vasanaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ tiracchānagatā
atk-s0512a0:1768_9: muducittataṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Iti so sabbattha mettānubhāvena abhīrū anutrāsī brahmā
atk-s0512a0:1768_10: viya avero vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “pavane sīhabyagghe ca, mettāyamupanāmayi”ntiādi.
atk-s0512a0:1769_0: Tattha mettāyamupanāmayinti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, mettābhāvanāya kurūrakammante
atk-s0512a0:1769_1: sīhabyagghepi phari, pageva sesasatteti adhippāyo. Atha vā mettā ayati pavattati
atk-s0512a0:1769_2: etenāti mettāyo, mettābhāvanā. Taṃ mettāyaṃ upanāmayiṃ sattesu anodhiso upanesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1769_3: “Sīhabyagghehī”tipi pāṭho. Tassattho – na kevalamahameva, atha kho pavane sīhabyagghehi,
atk-s0512a0:1769_4: yasmiṃ mahāvane tadā ahaṃ viharāmi, tattha sīhabyagghehi saddhiṃ ahaṃ sattesu mettaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1769_5: upanāmesiṃ. Sīhabyagghāpi hi tadā mamānubhāvena sattesu mettacittataṃ paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0512a0:1770: 112. Pasadamigavarāhehīti pasadamigehi ceva vanasūkarehi ca. Parivāretvāti etehi attānaṃ parivāritaṃ katvā tasmiṃ araññe vasiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1771_0: 113. Idāni tadā attano mettābhāvanāya laddhaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ matthakappattiñcassa dassetuṃ
atk-s0512a0:1771_1: “na maṃ koci uttasatī”ti osānagāthamāha. Tassattho – sasabiḷārādiko bhīrukajātikopi
atk-s0512a0:1771_2: koci satto maṃ na uttasati na ubbijjeti. Ahampi kassaci sīhabyagghāditiracchānato
atk-s0512a0:1771_3: yakkhādiamanussato luddalohitapāṇimanussatoti kutocipi na bhāyāmi. Kasmā? Yasmā mettābalenupatthaddho
atk-s0512a0:1771_4: cirakālaṃ bhāvitāya mettāpāramitāyānubhāvena upatthambhito tasmiṃ pavane mahāaraññe
atk-s0512a0:1772_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsatto sabbasatte mettāyanto mātāpitaro ca sādhukaṃ paṭijagganto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_1: araññato madhuraphalāphalaṃ āharitvā assame ṭhapetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā “pānīyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_2: ādāya āgamissāmī”ti migagaṇaparivuto dve mige ekato katvā tesaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_3: ṭhapetvā hatthena gahetvā nadītitthaṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyakkho
atk-s0512a0:1772_4: nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. So migamaṃsalobhena mātaraṃ rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā sannaddhapañcāvudho
atk-s0512a0:1772_5: himavantaṃ pavisitvā mige vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā caranto migasammataṃ nadiṃ patvā
atk-s0512a0:1772_6: anupubbena sāmassa pānīyagahaṇatitthaṃ patto. Migapadavalañjaṃ disvā gacchanto taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_7: tathā gacchantaṃ disvā “mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ vicaranto manusso na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0512a0:1772_8: devo nu kho esa nāgo nu kho, sacāhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmi, sahasā pakkameyyāti.
atk-s0512a0:1772_9: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ etaṃ vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā puccheyya”nti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ nhatvā
atk-s0512a0:1772_10: vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ pūretvā ukkhipitvā vāmaṃsakūṭe
atk-s0512a0:1772_11: ṭhapanakāle “idāni taṃ vijjhituṃ samayo”ti visapītena sarena dakkhiṇapasse vijjhi.
atk-s0512a0:1772_12: Saro vāmapassena nikkhami. Tassa viddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā migagaṇo bhīto palāyi.
atk-s0512a0:1773_0: Sāmapaṇḍito pana viddhopi pānīyaghaṭaṃ yathā vā tathā vā anavasumbhetvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:1773_1: saṇikaṃ otāretvā vālukaṃ byūhitvā ṭhapetvā disaṃ vavatthapetvā mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānadisābhāgena
atk-s0512a0:1773_2: sīsaṃ katvā nipajjitvā mukhena lohitaṃ chaḍḍetvā “mama koci verī nāma natthi, mamapi
atk-s0512a0:1773_3: katthaci veraṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0512a0:1774: “Ko nu maṃ usunā vijjhi, pamattaṃ udahārakaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1775: Khattiyo brāhmaṇo vesso, ko maṃ viddhā nilīyatī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1776_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ mayā vijjhitvā pathaviyaṃ pātitopi neva maṃ akkosati na paribhāsati,
atk-s0512a0:1776_1: mama hadayamaṃsaṃ sambāhanto viya piyavacanena samudācarati, gamissāmissa santika”nti
atk-s0512a0:1776_2: cintetvā upasaṅkamitvā attānaṃ attanā ca viddhabhāvaṃ āvikatvā “ko vā tvaṃ kassa
atk-s0512a0:1777_0: So “sāmo nāmāhaṃ dukūlapaṇḍitassa nāma nesādaisino putto, kissa pana maṃ vijjhī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1777_1: āha. So paṭhamaṃ “migasaññāyā”ti musāvādaṃ vatvā “ahaṃ imaṃ niraparādhaṃ akāraṇena
atk-s0512a0:1777_2: vijjhi”nti anusocitvā yathābhūtaṃ āvikatvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0512a0:1777_3: tattha gantvā tesaṃ attānaṃ āvikatvā tehi katapaṭisanthāro “sāmo mayā viddho”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a0:1777_4: te paridevante sokasamāpanne “yaṃ sāmena kattabbaṃ paricārikakammaṃ, taṃ katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1777_5: vo upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti samassāsetvā sāmassa santikaṃ ānesi. Te tattha gantvā nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1777_6: paridevitvā tassa ure hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā “puttassa me sarīre usumā vattateva, visavegena
atk-s0512a0:1777_7: visaññitaṃ āpanno bhavissatīti nibbisabhāvatthāya saccakiriyaṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0512a0:1778: “Yaṃ kiñcitthi kataṃ puññaṃ, mayhañceva pitucca te;
atk-s0512a0:1779: Sabbena tena kusalena, visaṃ sāmassa haññatū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1781: “Yaṃ kiñcitthi kataṃ puññaṃ, mayhañceva mātucca te;
atk-s0512a0:1782: Sabbena tena kusalena, visaṃ sāmassa haññatū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1785: Na me piyataro koci, añño sāmena vijjati;
atk-s0512a0:1787_0: Devatāya ca saccakiriyāya katāya mahāsatto khippaṃ vuṭṭhāsi. Padumapattapalāse udakabindu
atk-s0512a0:1787_1: viya vinivaṭṭetvā ābādho vigato. Viddhaṭṭhānaṃ arogaṃ pākatikameva ahosi. Mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1787_2: cakkhūni uppajjiṃsu. Iti mahāsattassa arogatā, mātāpitūnañca cakkhupaṭilābho, aruṇuggamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1787_3: tesaṃ catunnampi assameyeva avaṭṭhānanti sabbaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1788_0: Atha mahāsatto raññā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “dhammaṃ cara, mahārājā”tiādinā
atk-s0512a0:1788_1: dhammaṃ desetvā uttarimpi ovaditvā pañca sīlāni adāsi. So tassa ovādaṃ sirasā paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0512a0:1788_2: vanditvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyano ahosi. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0512a0:1788_3: saddhiṃ mātāpitūhi abhiññāsamāpattiyo nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1789: Tadā rājā ānandatthero ahosi, devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā, sakko anuruddho, pitā mahākassapatthero, mātā bhaddakāpilānī, sāmapaṇḍito lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1790_0: Tassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā visapītena sallena dakkhiṇapassena
atk-s0512a0:1790_1: pavisitvā vāmapassato vinivijjhanavasena viddhopi kiñci kāyavikāraṃ akatvā udakaghaṭassa
atk-s0512a0:1790_2: bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanaṃ, vadhake aññātepi ñāte viya cittavikārābhāvo, piyavacanena samudācāro,
atk-s0512a0:1790_3: mātāpituupaṭṭhānapuññato mayhaṃ parihānīti anusocanamattaṃ, aroge jāte rañño kāruññaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1790_4: mettañca upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammadesanā, ovādadānanti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1793: 114. Cuddasame ekarājāti vissutoti ekarājāti iminā anvatthanāmena jambudīpatale pākaṭo.
atk-s0512a0:1794_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā bārāṇasirañño putto hutvā nibbatti. Vayappatto sabbasippanipphattiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1794_1: patto hutvā pitu accayena rajjaṃ kārento kusalasīlācārasaddhāsutādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesayogena
atk-s0512a0:1794_2: pāramiparibhāvanena ca jambudīpatale adutiyattā padhānabhāvena ca “ekarājā”ti pakāsanāmo
atk-s0512a0:1794_5: ca avītikkamanavasena ca adhiṭṭhahitvā anuṭṭhahitvā. Pasāsāmi mahāmahinti tiyojanasatike
atk-s0512a0:1794_6: kāsiraṭṭhe mahatiṃ mahiṃ anusāsāmi rajjaṃ kāremi.
atk-s0512a0:1795_0: 115. Dasakusalakammapatheti pāṇātipātāveramaṇi yāva sammādiṭṭhīti etasmiṃ dasavidhe
atk-s0512a0:1795_1: kusalakammapathe, ete vā anavasesato samādāya vattāmi. Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhīti dānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1795_2: piyavacanaṃ atthacariyā samānattatāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgaṇhanakāraṇehi
atk-s0512a0:1795_3: yadā ekarājāti vissuto homi, tadā yathārahaṃ mahājanaṃ saṅgaṇhāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0512a0:1796_1: yathāvuttena iminā ākārena appamattassa. Idhaloke parattha cāti imasmiṃ loke yaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1796_2: appamajjanaṃ, tattha diṭṭhadhammike atthe, paraloke yaṃ appamajjanaṃ tattha samparāyike
atk-s0512a0:1796_3: atthe appamattassa me satoti attho. Dabbasenoti evaṃnāmako kosalarājā. Upagantvāti
atk-s0512a0:1796_4: caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā abbhuyyānavasena mama rajjaṃ upagantvā. Acchindanto
atk-s0512a0:1796_5: puraṃ mamāti mama bārāṇasinagaraṃ balakkārena gaṇhanto.
atk-s0512a0:1797_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – mahāsatto hi tadā nagarassa catūsu dvāresu catasso majjhe
atk-s0512a0:1797_1: ekaṃ nivesanadvāre ekanti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1797_2: rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, khantimettānuddayasampanno aṅke nisinnaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1797_3: paritosayamāno viya sabbasatte paritosayamāno dhammena rajjaṃ kāreti. Tasseko amacco
atk-s0512a0:1797_4: antepuraṃ padussitvā aparabhāge pākaṭova jāto. Amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0512a0:1797_5: taṃ attanā paccakkhato ñatvā taṃ amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā “andhabāla, ayuttaṃ te kataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1797_6: na tvaṃ mama vijite vasituṃ arahasi, attano dhanañca puttadārañca gahetvā aññattha
atk-s0512a0:1798_0: So kosalajanapadaṃ gantvā dabbasenaṃ nāma kosalarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanto anukkamena tassa
atk-s0512a0:1798_1: vissāsiko hutvā ekadivasaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ āha – “deva, bārāṇasirajjaṃ nimmakkhikamadhupaṭalasadisaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1798_2: atimuduko rājā, sukheneva taṃ rajjaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkosī”ti. Dabbaseno bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0512a0:1798_3: mahānubhāvatāya tassa vacanaṃ asaddahanto manusse pesetvā kāsiraṭṭhe gāmaghātādīni
atk-s0512a0:1798_4: kāretvā tesaṃ corānaṃ bodhisattena dhanaṃ datvā vissajjitabhāvaṃ sutvā “ativiya dhammiko
atk-s0512a0:1798_5: rājā”ti ñatvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti balavāhanaṃ ādāya niyyāsi. Atha bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0512a0:1798_6: mahāyodhā “kosalarājā āgacchatī”ti sutvā “amhākaṃ rajjasīmaṃ anokkamantameva naṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_0: Bodhisatto “tātā, maṃ nissāya aññesaṃ kilamanakiccaṃ natthi, rajjatthikā rajjaṃ gaṇhantu,
atk-s0512a0:1799_1: mā gamitthā”ti nivāresi. Kosalarājā janapadamajjhaṃ pāvisi. Mahāyodhā punapi rañño
atk-s0512a0:1799_2: tatheva vadiṃsu. Rājā purimanayeneva nivāresi. Dabbaseno bahinagare ṭhatvā “rajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_3: vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti ekarājassa sāsanaṃ pesesi. Ekarājā “natthi mayā yuddhaṃ, rajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_4: gaṇhātū”ti paṭisāsanaṃ pesesi. Punapi mahāyodhā “deva, na mayaṃ kosalarañño nagaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_5: pavisituṃ dema, bahinagareyeva naṃ pothetvā gaṇhāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā purimanayeneva
atk-s0512a0:1799_6: nivāretvā nagaradvārāni avāpurāpetvā mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīdi. Dabbaseno mahantena
atk-s0512a0:1799_7: balavāhanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā ekampi paṭisattuṃ apassanto sabbarajjaṃ hatthagataṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_8: katvā rājanivesanaṃ gantvā mahātalaṃ āruyha niraparādhaṃ bodhisattaṃ gaṇhāpetvā āvāṭe
atk-s0512a0:1803: Sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, kāsuyā nikhaṇī mama”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1804_0: Tattha rājūpajīveti amaccapārisajjabrāhmaṇagahapatiādike rājānaṃ upanissāya jīvante.
atk-s0512a0:1804_1: Nigameti negame. Sabalaṭṭheti senāpariyāpannatāya bale tiṭṭhantīti balaṭṭhā, hatthārohādayo,
atk-s0512a0:1804_2: balaṭṭhehi sahāti sabalaṭṭhe. Saraṭṭhaketi sajanapade, rājūpajīve nigame ca aññañca
atk-s0512a0:1804_3: sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā. Kāsuyā nikhaṇī mamanti sabalavāhanaṃ sakalaṃ mama rajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1804_4: gahetvā mampi galappamāṇe āvāṭe nikhaṇāpesi. Jātakepi –
atk-s0512a0:1805: “Anuttare kāmaguṇe samiddhe, bhutvāna pubbe vasi ekarājā;
atk-s0512a0:1806: So dāni dugge narakamhi khitto, nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:1807: Āvāṭe khittabhāvo āgato. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sikkāya pakkhipāpetvā uttarummāre heṭṭhāsīsakaṃ olambesī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1808: Mahāsatto corarājānaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ bhāvetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā kāsuto uggantvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1812_0: Tattha amaccamaṇḍalanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rājakicce raññā amā saha vattantīti amaccā,
atk-s0512a0:1812_1: saddhiṃ vā tesaṃ maṇḍalaṃ samūhaṃ. Phītanti balavāhanena nagarajanapadādīhi samiddhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1812_2: rajjaṃ. Itthāgāradāsidāsaparijanehi ceva vatthābharaṇādiupabhogūpakaraṇehi ca samiddhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1812_3: mama antepurañca acchinditvā gahitakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ amittarājānaṃ yāya attano piyaputtaṃva
atk-s0512a0:1812_4: passiṃ ahaṃ, tāya evaṃbhūtāya mettāya me samo sakalaloke natthi, tasmā evaṃbhūtā
atk-s0512a0:1812_5: esā me mettāpāramī paramatthapāramibhāvaṃ pattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a0:1813_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsatte taṃ corarājānaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ pharitvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisinne
atk-s0512a0:1813_1: tassa sarīre dāho uppajji. So “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti bhūmiyaṃ aparāparaṃ parivattati.
atk-s0512a0:1813_2: “Kimeta”nti vutte, mahārāja, tumhe niraparādhaṃ dhammikarājānaṃ āvāṭe nikhaṇāpayitthāti.
atk-s0512a0:1813_3: “Tena hi vegena gantvā taṃ uddharathā”ti āha. Purisā gantvā taṃ rājānaṃ ākāse pallaṅkena
atk-s0512a0:1813_4: nisinnaṃ disvā āgantvā dabbasenassa ārocesuṃ. So vegena gantvā vanditvā khamāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:1813_5: “tumhākaṃ rajjaṃ tumheva kāretha, ahaṃ vo core paṭibāhessāmī”ti vatvā tassa duṭṭhāmaccassa
atk-s0512a0:1813_6: rājāṇaṃ kāretvā pakkāmi. Bodhisattopi rajjaṃ amaccānaṃ niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0512a0:1813_7: mahājanaṃ sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1814: Tadā dabbaseno ānandatthero ahosi, ekarājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1815_0: Tassa divase divase chasu dānasālāsu chasatasahassavissajjanena paccatthikarañño
atk-s0512a0:1815_1: sakalarajjapariccāgena ca dānapāramī, niccasīlauposathakammavasena pabbajitassa anavasesasīlasaṃvaravasena
atk-s0512a0:1815_2: ca sīlapāramī, pabbajjāvasena jhānādhigamavasena ca nekkhammapāramī, sattānaṃ hitāhitavicāraṇavasena
atk-s0512a0:1815_4: kāmavitakkādivinodanavasena ca vīriyapāramī, duṭṭhāmaccassa dabbasenarañño ca aparādhasahanavasena
atk-s0512a0:1815_5: khantipāramī, yathāpaṭiññaṃ dānādinā avisaṃvādanavasena ca saccapāramī, dānādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1815_7: mettājhānanibbattanena ca mettāpāramī, duṭṭhāmaccena dabbasenena ca katāparādhe hitesīhi
atk-s0512a0:1815_8: attano amaccādīhi nibbattite upakāre ca ajjhupekkhaṇena rajjasukhappattakāle paccatthikaraññā
atk-s0512a0:1815_9: narake khittakāle samānacittatāya ca upekkhāpāramī veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1816: “Panujja dukkhena sukhaṃ janinda, sukhena vā dukkhamasayhasāhi;
atk-s0512a0:1817: Ubhayattha santo abhinibbutattā, sukhe ca dukkhe ca bhavanti tulyā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1818_0: Yasmā panettha mettāpāramī atisayavatī, tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ sā eva pāḷi āruḷhā.
atk-s0512a0:1818_1: Tathā idha mahāsattassa sabbasattesu orasaputte viya samānukampatādayo guṇavisesā niddhāretabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1823_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā mahati uḷārabhoge kule nibbattitvā vuddhimanvāya disāpāmokkhassa
atk-s0512a0:1823_1: ācariyassa santike garuvāsaṃ vasanto sabbasippānaṃ nipphattiṃ patvā kulagharaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0512a0:1823_2: mātāpitūnaṃ accayena ñātakehi “kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti yāciyamānopi aniccatāmanasikāramukhena
atk-s0512a0:1823_3: sabbabhavesu abhivaḍḍhamānasaṃvego kāye ca asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā gharāvāsapalibodhādhibhūtaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1823_5: mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitukāmo hutvā puna cintesi – “sacāhaṃ pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1824_0: So lābhasakkāraṃ jigucchanto pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā “pahomi cāhaṃ lābhālābhādīsu nibbikāro
atk-s0512a0:1824_1: hotu”nti attānaṃ takkento “visesato paraparibhavasahanādipaṭipadaṃ pūrento upekkhāpāramiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1824_2: matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti nivatthavattheneva gehato nikkhamitvā paramasallekhavuttikopi
atk-s0512a0:1824_3: abalabalo amandamando viya paresaṃ acittakarūpena hīḷitaparibhūto hutvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0512a0:1824_4: ekarattivāseneva vicarati. Yattha pana mahantaṃ paribhavaṃ paṭilabhati, tattha cirampi
atk-s0512a0:1824_5: vasati. So nivatthavatthe jiṇṇe pilotikakhaṇḍena tasmimpi jiṇṇe kenaci dinnaṃ aggaṇhanto
atk-s0512a0:1824_6: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanamatteneva carati. Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekaṃ nigamagāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1825_0: Tattha gāmadārakā dhuttajātikā vedhaverā keci rājavallabhānaṃ puttanattudāsādayo
atk-s0512a0:1825_1: ca uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā kālena kālaṃ kīḷābahulā vicaranti. Duggate
atk-s0512a0:1825_2: mahallake purise ca itthiyo ca gacchante disvā bhasmapuṭena piṭṭhiyaṃ ākiranti, ketakīpaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1825_3: kacchantare olambenti, tena vippakārena parivattetvā olokente yathāvajjakīḷitaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0512a0:1825_4: upahasanti. Mahāpuriso tasmiṃ nigame te evaṃ vicarante dhuttadārake disvā “laddho
atk-s0512a0:1825_5: vata dāni me upekkhāpāramiyā paripūraṇūpāyo”ti cintetvā tattha vihāsi. Taṃ te dhuttadārakā
atk-s0512a0:1826_0: Mahāsatto taṃ asahanto viya ca tehi bhāyanto viya ca uṭṭhahitvā gacchati. Te taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1826_1: anubandhanti. So tehi anubandhiyamāno “ettha natthi koci paṭivattā”ti susānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a0:1826_2: aṭṭhikaṃ sīsūpadhānaṃ katvā sayati. Dhuttadārakāpi tattha gantvā oṭṭhubhanādikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1826_3: nānappakāraṃ vippakāraṃ katvā pakkamanti. Evaṃ te divase divase karonti eva. Ye pana
atk-s0512a0:1826_4: viññū purisā, te evaṃ karonte passanti. Te te paṭibāhitvā “ayaṃ mahānubhāvo tapassī
atk-s0512a0:1826_5: mahāyogī”ti ca ñatvā uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ karonti. Mahāsatto pana sabbattha ekasadisova
atk-s0512a0:1826_6: hoti majjhattabhūto. Tena vuttaṃ “susāne seyyaṃ kappemī”tiādi.
atk-s0512a0:1827_0: Tattha susāne seyyaṃ kappemi, chavaṭṭhikaṃ upanidhāyāti āmakasusāne chaḍḍitakaḷevarato
atk-s0512a0:1827_1: soṇasiṅgālādīhi tahiṃ tahiṃ vikkhittesu aṭṭhikesu ekaṃ aṭṭhikaṃ sīsūpadhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a0:1827_2: sucimhi ca asucimhi ca samānacittatāya tasmiṃ susāne seyyaṃ kappemi, sayāmīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1827_3: Gāmaṇḍalāti gāmadārakā. Rūpaṃ dassentinappakanti yathāvajjakīḷitāya oṭṭhubhanaupahasanaummihanādīhi
atk-s0512a0:1827_4: kaṇṇasote salākappavesanādīhi ca atikakkhaḷaṃ anappakaṃ nānappakāraṃ rūpaṃ vikāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0512a0:1828_0: 120. Apareti tesu eva gāmadārakesu ekacce. Upāyanānūpanentīti “ayaṃ imesu paribhavavasena
atk-s0512a0:1828_1: evarūpaṃ vippakāraṃ karontesu na kiñci vikāraṃ dasseti, sammānane nu kho kīdiso”ti
atk-s0512a0:1828_2: pariggaṇhantā vividhaṃ bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ bhojanaṃ aññāni ca upāyanāni paṇṇākārāni
atk-s0512a0:1828_3: upanenti upaharanti. Aparehi vā tehi anācāragāmadārakehi aññe viññū manussā “ayaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1828_4: imesaṃ evaṃ vividhampi vippakāraṃ karontānaṃ na kuppati, aññadatthu khantimettānuddayaṃyeva
atk-s0512a0:1828_5: tesu upaṭṭhapeti, aho acchariyapuriso”ti haṭṭhā “bahu vatimehi etasmiṃ vippaṭipajjantehi
atk-s0512a0:1828_6: apuññaṃ pasuta”nti saṃviggamānasāva hutvā bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ vividhaṃ bhojanaṃ aññāni
atk-s0512a0:1829_0: 121. Ye me dukkhaṃ upaharantīti ye gāmadārakā mayhaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ upaharanti upanenti.
atk-s0512a0:1829_1: “Upadahantī”tipi pāṭho, uppādentīti attho. Ye ca denti sukhaṃ mamāti ye ca viññū
atk-s0512a0:1829_2: manussā mama mayhaṃ sukhaṃ denti, mālāgandhabhojanādisukhūpakaraṇehi mama sukhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1829_3: upaharanti. Sabbesaṃ samako homīti katthacipi vikārānuppattiyā samānacittatāya vividhānampi
