atk-s0512a0:1893_0: Tatridaṃ pañhakammaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyo? Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyo? Katividhā cetā? Ko
atk-s0512a0:1893_1: tāsaṃ kamo? Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Ko paccayo? Ko saṃkileso?
atk-s0512a0:1893_2: Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Ko paṭipakkho? Kā paṭipatti? Ko vibhāgo? Ko saṅgaho? Ko sampādanūpāyo?
atk-s0512a0:1893_3: Kittakena kālena sampādanaṃ? Ko ānisaṃso? Kiṃ cetāsaṃ phalanti?
atk-s0512a0:1894: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyoti? Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
atk-s0512a0:1895_0: Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyoti? Dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā
atk-s0512a0:1895_1: bodhisattā, tesaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyā. Atha vā paratīti paramo,
atk-s0512a0:1895_2: dānādiguṇānaṃ pūrako pālako cāti bodhisatto, paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo,
atk-s0512a0:1895_3: kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyāva. Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
atk-s0512a0:1895_4: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1895_5: visesena mayati gacchati, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya
atk-s0512a0:1895_6: munāti paricchindati, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
atk-s0512a0:1895_7: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1895_8: mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto. Paramassa ayantiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Pāre
atk-s0512a0:1895_9: vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti, tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti,
atk-s0512a0:1895_10: taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca, munāti vā taṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte minoti
atk-s0512a0:1895_11: pakkhipati, kilesārayo vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso. Tassa
atk-s0512a0:1895_12: bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramitā, dānādikiriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīsaddattho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1896: Katividhāti? Saṅkhepato dasavidhā. Tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
atk-s0512a0:1899_0: Ādi. Yathā cāha – “kati nu kho, bhante, buddhakārakā dhammā? Dasa kho, sāriputta,

atk-s0512a0:1899_2: nekkhammaṃ, paññā, vīriyaṃ, khanti, saccaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ, mettā, upekkhā buddhakārako

atk-s0512a0:1902: Keci pana “chabbidhā”ti vadanti. Taṃ etāsaṃ saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. So pana saṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0512a0:1903_0: Ko tāsaṃ kamoti? Ettha kamoti desanākkamo, so ca paṭhamasamādānahetuko, samādānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1903_1: pavicayahetukaṃ, iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca, tathā desitā. Tattha dānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1903_2: sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1903_3: hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ, nekkhammaṃ

atk-s0512a0:1903_5: saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ, mettā upekkhāpariggahitā
atk-s0512a0:1903_6: mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaramupekkhā vuttā. Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā
atk-s0512a0:1903_7: karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. “Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu
atk-s0512a0:1903_8: upekkhakā hontī”ti? “Upekkhitabbayuttesu kañci kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha
atk-s0512a0:1903_9: sabbadā cā”ti keci. Apare pana – “na sattesu upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1904_0: Aparo nayo – pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā appaphalattā sukarattā
atk-s0512a0:1904_1: ca ādimhi dānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_2: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_3: ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1904_4: vatvā manosucaritavacanato visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato kammāparādhappahānena
atk-s0512a0:1904_6: cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
atk-s0512a0:1904_8: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi”. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_9: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā
atk-s0512a0:1904_11: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_12: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca “nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1905_0: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito “vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1905_1: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati”. Vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato “vīriyavato hi titikkhā
atk-s0512a0:1905_2: sobhati”. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1905_4: “khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti”. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1905_5: “yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti”. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato
atk-s0512a0:1905_6: ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato apakārino apakārakhantiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1905_7: vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena bhūtavāditāya
atk-s0512a0:1906_0: Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito “acalādhiṭṭhānassa hi virati sijjhati”. Avisaṃvāditaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1906_1: vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato “saccasandho hi dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova
atk-s0512a0:1906_3: hi bodhisambhāre adhiṭṭhāti, te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato”ti saccassa
atk-s0512a0:1906_4: anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1906_5: vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato “bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī hoti”. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
atk-s0512a0:1906_6: samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya
atk-s0512a0:1906_7: mettāvisuddhito sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu udāsīnatāvacanato mettābhāvanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1906_9: ca mettāya anantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1907_0: Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo
atk-s0512a0:1907_1: parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a0:1908_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attūpakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā,
atk-s0512a0:1909_0: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇā dānapāramī, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasā, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a0:1909_2: sīlapāramī, samādhānalakkhaṇā patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇā cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasā,
atk-s0512a0:1909_3: anavajjarasā vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānā, hirottappapadaṭṭhānā. Kāmato ca bhavato ca
atk-s0512a0:1909_4: nikkhamanalakkhaṇā nekkhammapāramī, tadādīnavavibhāvanarasā, tato eva vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a0:1909_6: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-s0512a0:1909_7: araññagatasudesiko viya, samādhipadaṭṭhānā, catusaccapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ussāhalakkhaṇā
atk-s0512a0:1909_9: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānā vā. Khamanalakkhaṇā khantipāramī, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasahanarasā, adhivāsanapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a0:1909_12: adhiṭṭhānalakkhaṇā adhiṭṭhānapāramī, tesaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavanarasā, tattha acalatāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a0:1910_0: Ettha ca karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitatā dānādīnaṃ pariccāgādilakkhaṇassa visesanabhāvena
atk-s0512a0:1910_1: vattabbā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitāni hi dānādīni bodhisattasantāne pavattāni
atk-s0512a0:1911: Ko paccayoti? Abhinīhāro tāva pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Yo hi ayaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1915_0: Evaṃ vutto aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyyaṃ danto dameyyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1915_1: santo sameyyaṃ assattho assāseyyaṃ parinibbuto parinibbāpeyyaṃ suddho sodheyyaṃ buddho
atk-s0512a0:1915_2: bodheyya”ntiādinayappavatto abhinīhāro. So avisesena sabbapāramīnaṃ paccayo. Tappavattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1916_0: Tattha manussattanti manussattabhāvo. Manussattabhāveyeva hi ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa
atk-s0512a0:1916_1: patthanā samijjhati, na nāgasupaṇṇādijātīsu ṭhitassa. Kasmāti ce? Buddhabhāvassa
atk-s0512a0:1917_0: Liṅgasampattīti manussattabhāve ṭhitassāpi purisasseva patthanā samijjhati, na itthiyā
atk-s0512a0:1917_1: na paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati. Kasmāti ce? Yathāvuttakāraṇato
atk-s0512a0:1917_2: lakkhaṇapāripūriyā abhāvato ca. Vuttañcetaṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0512a0:1917_3: yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho”ti vitthāro. Tasmā manussajātikassāpi itthiliṅge
atk-s0512a0:1917_4: ṭhitassa paṇḍakādīnaṃ vā patthanā na samijjhati.
atk-s0512a0:1918: Hetūti upanissayasampatti. Manussapurisassāpi hi upanissayasampannasseva hetusampattiyā patthanā samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a0:1919_0: Satthāradassananti satthusammukhībhāvo. Dharamānakabuddhasseva hi santike patthentassa
atk-s0512a0:1919_1: patthanā samijjhati, parinibbute pana bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhimūle vā
atk-s0512a0:1919_2: paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:1919_3: Adhikārassa balavabhāvābhāvato. Buddhānaṃ eva pana santike patthanā samijjhati, ajjhāsayassa
atk-s0512a0:1920_0: Pabbajjāti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu
atk-s0512a0:1920_1: vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati, no gihiliṅge ṭhitassa. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:1920_2: Buddhabhāvassa ananucchavikabhāvato. Pabbajitā eva hi mahābodhisattā sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1920_3: adhigacchanti, na gahaṭṭhabhūtā, tasmā paṇidhānakāle ca pabbajjāliṅgaṃ eva hi yuttarūpaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1921_0: Guṇasampattīti abhiññādiguṇasampadā. Pabbajitassāpi hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññasseva
atk-s0512a0:1921_1: patthanā samijjhati, na yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā virahitassa. Kasmā? Pāramipavicayassa
atk-s0512a0:1921_2: asamatthabhāvato, upanissayasampattiyā abhiññāsampattiyā ca samannāgatattā mahāpurisā
atk-s0512a0:1921_3: katābhinīhārā sayameva pāramī pavicetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0512a0:1922: Adhikāroti adhiko upakāro. Yathāvuttaguṇasampannopi hi yo attano jīvitampi buddhānaṃ pariccajitvā tasmiṃ kāle adhikaṃ upakāraṃ karoti, tasseva abhinīhāro samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a0:1923_0: Chandatāti kattukāmatākusalacchando. Yassa hi yathāvuttadhammasamannāgatassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1923_1: atthāya mahanto chando mahatī patthanā mahatī kattukāmatā atthi, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a0:1924_0: Tatridaṃ chandamahantatāya opammaṃ – yo sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano
atk-s0512a0:1924_1: bāhubaleneva uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇātīti sutvā taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_2: dukkarato adahanto “ahaṃ taṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti, na tattha
atk-s0512a0:1924_3: saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ vigatadhūmānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_4: pūraṃ pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā parabhāgaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_5: āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi sunisitaphalehi nirantaraṃ ākiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_6: pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_8: gantuṃ samattho…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo “cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0512a0:1924_9: satasahassañca kappe niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ pattabba”nti sutvā taṃ dukkarato
atk-s0512a0:1924_10: adahanto “ahaṃ tattha paccitvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti, na tattha
atk-s0512a0:1924_11: saṅkocaṃ āpajjatīti evamādinā nayena ettha chandassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1925_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato panāyaṃ abhinīhāro atthato tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ samodhānena
atk-s0512a0:1925_1: tathāpavatto cittuppādoti veditabbo. So sammadeva sammāsambodhiyā paṇidhānalakkhaṇo.
atk-s0512a0:1925_2: “Aho vatāhaṃ anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjheyyaṃ, sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1925_4: upanissayasampattipadaṭṭhāno vā. Acinteyyaṃ buddhabhūmiṃ aparimāṇaṃ sattalokahitañca
atk-s0512a0:1925_5: ārabbha pavattiyā sabbabuddhakārakadhammamūlabhūto paramabhaddako paramakalyāṇo aparimeyyappabhāvo
atk-s0512a0:1926_0: Yassa ca uppattiyā saheva mahāpuriso mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti niyatabhāvasamadhigamanato
atk-s0512a0:1926_1: tato anivattanasabhāvattā bodhisattoti samaññaṃ paṭilabhati, sabbabhāvena sammāsambodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1926_3: hi mahāpurisā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanapubbaliṅgena sayambhuñāṇena sammadeva sabbapāramiyo
atk-s0512a0:1926_4: pavicinitvā samādāya anukkamena paripūrenti. Tathā katamahābhinīhāro hi sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-s0512a0:1928: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā;
atk-s0512a0:1930: Vitthāro. Tassa ca abhinīhārassa cattāro paccayā cattāro hetū cattāri ca balāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:1931_0: Tattha katame cattāro paccayā? Idha mahāpuriso passati tathāgataṃ mahatā buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0512a0:1931_1: acchariyabbhutaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ. Tassa taṃ nissāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā mahābodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1931_2: cittaṃ santiṭṭhati – “mahānubhāvā vatāyaṃ dhammadhātu, yassā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā
atk-s0512a0:1931_3: evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammo acinteyyānubhāvo cā”ti. So tameva mahānubhāvadassanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1931_4: nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ paṭhamo
atk-s0512a0:1932_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, api ca kho suṇāti “ediso
atk-s0512a0:1932_1: ca ediso ca bhagavā”ti. So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto
atk-s0512a0:1932_2: tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ dutiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a0:1933_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, napi taṃ parato suṇāti,
atk-s0512a0:1933_1: api ca kho tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desentassa “dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato”tiādinā
atk-s0512a0:1933_2: buddhānubhāvapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti. So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1933_3: adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ tatiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a0:1934_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, napi taṃ parato suṇāti,
atk-s0512a0:1934_1: napi tathāgatassa dhammaṃ suṇāti, api ca kho uḷārajjhāsayo kalyāṇādhimuttiko “ahametaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1934_2: buddhavaṃsaṃ buddhatantiṃ buddhapaveṇiṃ buddhadhammataṃ paripālessāmī”ti yāvadeva
atk-s0512a0:1934_3: dhammaṃ eva sakkaronto garukaronto mānento pūjento dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ nissāya
atk-s0512a0:1934_4: taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ catuttho
atk-s0512a0:1935_0: Tattha katame cattāro hetū mahābhinīhārāya? Idha mahāpuriso pakatiyā upanissayasampannova
atk-s0512a0:1935_1: hoti purimakesu buddhesu katādhikāro. Ayaṃ paṭhamo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1935_2: mahāpuriso pakatiyā karuṇājjhāsayo hoti karuṇādhimutto sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo
atk-s0512a0:1935_3: api ca attano kāyajīvitaṃ pariccajitvā. Ayaṃ dutiyo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1935_4: mahāpuriso sakalatopi vaṭṭadukkhato sattahitāya ca dukkaracariyato sucirampi kālaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1935_5: ghaṭento vāyamanto anibbinno hoti anutrāsī yāva icchitatthanipphatti. Ayaṃ tatiyo
atk-s0512a0:1935_6: hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso kalyāṇamittasannissito hoti, yo ahitato
atk-s0512a0:1935_7: nivāreti, hite patiṭṭhapeti. Ayaṃ catuttho hetu mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a0:1936_0: Tatrāyaṃ mahāpurisassa upanissayasampadā – ekantenevassa yathā ajjhāsayo sambodhininno
atk-s0512a0:1936_1: hoti sambodhipoṇo sambodhipabbhāro, tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyā. Yato cānena purimabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1936_2: santike sambodhiyā paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ hoti manasā vācāya ca “ahampi ediso sammāsambuddho
atk-s0512a0:1936_3: hutvā sammadeva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”nti. Evaṃ sampannūpanissayassa panassa
atk-s0512a0:1936_4: imāni upanissayasampattiyā liṅgāni bhavanti yehi samannāgatassa sāvakabodhisattehi
atk-s0512a0:1936_5: ca paccekabodhisattehi ca mahāviseso mahantaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati indriyato paṭipattito
atk-s0512a0:1936_6: kosallato ca. Idha upanissayasampanno mahāpuriso yathā visadindriyo hoti visadañāṇo,
atk-s0512a0:1936_7: na tathā itare. Parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, na attahitāya. Tathā hi so yathā bahujanahitāya
atk-s0512a0:1936_8: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0512a0:1936_9: na tathā itare. Tattha ca kosallaṃ āvahati ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena ṭhānāṭhānakusalatāya ca.
atk-s0512a0:1937_0: Tathā mahāpuriso pakatiyā dānajjhāsayo hoti dānābhirato, sati deyyadhamme deti eva,
atk-s0512a0:1937_1: na dānato saṅkocaṃ āpajjati, satataṃ samitaṃ saṃvibhāgasīlo hoti, pamuditova deti
atk-s0512a0:1937_2: ādarajāto, na udāsīnacitto, mahantampi dānaṃ datvā na ca dānena santuṭṭho hoti, pageva
atk-s0512a0:1937_3: appaṃ, paresañca ussāhaṃ janento dāne vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1937_4: karoti, aññe ca paresaṃ dente disvā attamano hoti, bhayaṭṭhānesu ca paresaṃ abhayaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1937_5: detīti evamādīni dānajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa dānapāramiyā liṅgāni.
atk-s0512a0:1938_0: Tathā pāṇātipātādīhi pāpadhammehi hirīyati ottappati, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanajātiko hoti

atk-s0512a0:1940_1: kalyāṇamittasannissayo hetū”ti. Tatridaṃ saṅkhepato kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ – idha

atk-s0512a0:1940_7: appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti
atk-s0512a0:1940_8: sattānaṃ hitapaṭipattiyaṃ, satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitasati hoti anavajjadhammesu, samādhisampattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1940_9: avikkhitto hoti samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti, so satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1940_10: dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā
atk-s0512a0:1940_11: tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena ahitā satte nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0512a0:1942: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –

atk-s0512a0:1944_3: parasannissayā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso lokādhipati mānāpassayo
atk-s0512a0:1944_4: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Upanissayabalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1944_5: yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ upanissayasampattiyā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso

atk-s0512a0:1944_7: sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Payogabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ tajjā payogasampadā sakkaccakāritā

atk-s0512a0:1945_0: Evamayaṃ catūhi paccayehi catūhi hetūhi catūhi ca balehi sampannasamudāgamo aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānasampādito

atk-s0512a0:1946_1: bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā, yāhi mahākaruṇūpāyakosallatāhi mahāpurisānaṃ

atk-s0512a0:1946_5: paññāya sayaṃ tarati, karuṇāya pare tāreti, paññāya paradukkhaṃ parijānāti, karuṇāya
atk-s0512a0:1946_6: paradukkhapatikāraṃ ārabhati, paññāya ca dukkhe nibbindati, karuṇāya dukkhaṃ sampaṭicchati,

atk-s0512a0:1946_8: hoti, paññāya tatra nābhiramati, paññāya ca sabbattha virajjati, karuṇānugatattā

atk-s0512a0:1946_14: visesena upāyabhāvato paññākaruṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Idañca dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya
atk-s0512a0:1947_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā, yā buddhabhāvassa
atk-s0512a0:1947_1: uppattiṭṭhānatāya buddhabhūmiyoti vuccanti. Tattha ussāho nāma bodhisambhārānaṃ abbhussahanavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1947_2: Ummaṅgo nāma bodhisambhāresu upāyakosallabhūtā paññā. Avatthānaṃ nāma adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1947_3: acalādhiṭṭhānatā. Hitacariyā nāma mettābhāvanā karuṇābhāvanā ca.

atk-s0512a0:1953_2: somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Dadantopi hi yācakānaṃ piyo hotīti. Atha pana verī puggalo
atk-s0512a0:1953_3: yācati, “paccatthiko maṃ yācati, ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verī piyo
atk-s0512a0:1953_4: mitto hotī”ti visesena somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaveripuggalesupi

atk-s0512a0:1975_12: parikkhāro. Tattha sīlādīhi payogasuddhiyā sattānaṃ abhayadāne āsayasuddhiyā āmisadāne
atk-s0512a0:1975_13: ubhayasuddhiyā dhammadāne samattho hotītiādinā caraṇādīnaṃ dānādisambhārānaṃ paccayabhāvo
atk-s0512a0:1975_14: yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbo. Ativitthārabhayena na niddhārayimhāti. Evaṃ sampatticakkādayopi
atk-s0512a0:1976_0: Ko saṃkilesoti? Avisesena taṇhādīhi parāmaṭṭhabhāvo pāramīnaṃ saṃkileso, visesena
atk-s0512a0:1976_1: pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakavikappā dānapāramiyā saṃkileso. Sattakālavikappā sīlapāramiyā,
atk-s0512a0:1976_2: kāmabhavatadupasamesu abhiratianabhirativikappā nekkhammapāramiyā, ahaṃ mamāti vikappā
atk-s0512a0:1977_0: Kiṃ vodānanti? Taṇhādīhi anupaghāto yathāvuttavikappaviraho ca etāsaṃ vodānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1977_2: kilesehi deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo parisuddhā pabhassarā bhavantīti.
atk-s0512a0:1978_0: Ko paṭipakkhoti? Avisesena sabbepi saṃkilesā sabbepi akusalā dhammā etāsaṃ paṭipakkho,
atk-s0512a0:1978_1: visesena pana pubbe vuttā maccherādayoti veditabbā. Api ca deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakadānaphalesu
atk-s0512a0:1978_4: nekkhammaṃ, lobhādīnaṃ andhīkaraṇato ñāṇassa ca anandhīkaraṇato lobhādipaṭipakkhā
atk-s0512a0:1978_6: khamanato lobhādipaṭipakkhā khanti, satipi paresaṃ upakāre apakāre ca yathābhūtappavattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1978_7: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ saccaṃ, lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato
atk-s0512a0:1978_8: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, nīvaraṇavivekato lobhādipaṭipakkhā mettā, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
atk-s0512a0:1978_9: anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanato samappavattito ca lobhādipaṭipakkhā upekkhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1979_0: Kā paṭipattīti? Dānapāramiyā tāva sukhūpakaraṇasarīrajīvitapariccāgena bhayāpanudanena
atk-s0512a0:1979_1: dhammopadesena ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ paṭipatti. Tattha āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1979_2: dhammadānanti dātabbavatthuvasena tividhaṃ dānaṃ. Tesu bodhisattassa dātabbavatthu
atk-s0512a0:1979_3: ajjhattikaṃ bāhiranti duvidhaṃ. Tattha bāhiraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1979_5: Tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti ārammaṇato chabbidhaṃ. Rūpārammaṇādīnañca
atk-s0512a0:1980_0: Tattha mahāpuriso bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ dento “yo yena atthiko, taṃ tassa deti, dento ca
atk-s0512a0:1980_1: tassa atthiko”ti sayameva jānanto ayācitopi deti pageva yācito. Muttacāgo deti, no
atk-s0512a0:1980_2: amuttacāgo, pariyattaṃ deti, no apariyattaṃ sati deyyadhamme. Na paccupakārasannissito
atk-s0512a0:1980_3: deti. Asati deyyadhamme hi pariyatte saṃvibhāgārahaṃ saṃvibhajati. Na ca deti parūpaghātāvahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1980_4: satthavisamajjādikaṃ, nāpi kīḷanakaṃ yaṃ anatthūpasaṃhitaṃ pamādāvahañca. Na ca gilānassa
atk-s0512a0:1980_5: yācakassa pānabhojanādiasappāyaṃ pamāṇarahitaṃ vā deti, pamāṇayuttaṃ pana sappāyameva deti.
atk-s0512a0:1981_0: Tathā yācito gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhānucchavikaṃ deti, pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_1: deti, mātāpitaro ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā puttadāradāsakammakarāti etesu kassaci pīḷaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_2: ajanento deti, na ca uḷāraṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭijānitvā lūkhaṃ deti, na ca lābhasakkārasilokasannissito
atk-s0512a0:1981_3: deti, na ca paccupakārasannissito deti, na ca phalapāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā,
atk-s0512a0:1981_4: na ca yācake deyyadhammaṃ vā jigucchanto deti, na ca asaññatānaṃ yācakānaṃ akkosakarosakānampi
atk-s0512a0:1981_5: apaviddhaṃ dānaṃ deti, aññadatthu pasannacitto anukampanto sakkaccameva deti, na
atk-s0512a0:1981_6: ca kotūhalamaṅgaliko hutvā deti, kammaphalameva pana saddahanto deti, napi yācake
atk-s0512a0:1981_7: payirupāsanādīhi parikilesetvā deti, aparikilesanto eva pana deti, na ca paresaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_8: vañcanādhippāyo bhedanādhippāyo vā dānaṃ deti, asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto eva deti, napi pharusavāco
atk-s0512a0:1981_9: bhākuṭimukho dānaṃ deti, piyavādī pana pubbabhāsī mitavacano hutvā deti, yasmiñca
atk-s0512a0:1981_10: deyyadhamme uḷāramanuññatāya vā ciraparicayena vā gedhasabhāvatāya vā lobhadhammo
atk-s0512a0:1981_11: adhimatto hoti, jānanto bodhisatto taṃ khippameva paṭivinodetvā yācake pariyesitvāpi
atk-s0512a0:1981_12: deti, yañca deyyavatthu parittaṃ yācakopi paccupaṭṭhito, taṃ acintetvāpi attānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_13: bādhetvā dento yācakaṃ sammāneti yathā taṃ akittipaṇḍito. Na ca mahāpuriso attano
atk-s0512a0:1981_14: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise yācito te asaññāpite domanassappatte yācakānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:1981_15: sammadeva pana saññāpite somanassappatte deti. Dento ca yakkharakkhasapisācādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_16: vā manussānaṃ kurūrakammantānaṃ vā jānanto na deti, tathā rajjampi tādisānaṃ na deti.
atk-s0512a0:1981_17: Ye lokassa ahitāya dukkhāya anatthāya paṭipajjanti, ye pana dhammikā dhammena lokaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1981_18: pālenti, tesaṃ deti. Evaṃ tāva bāhiradāne paṭipatti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1982_0: Ajjhattikadānaṃ pana dvīhi ākārehi veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma koci puriso ghāsacchādanahetu
atk-s0512a0:1982_1: attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati dāsabyaṃ, evameva mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a0:1982_2: sambodhihetu nirāmisacitto sattānaṃ anuttaraṃ hitasukhaṃ icchanto attano dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0512a0:1982_3: paripūretukāmo attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1982_4: Karacaraṇanayanādiaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ tena tena atthikānaṃ akampito anolīno anuppadeti,
atk-s0512a0:1982_5: na tattha sajjati na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati yathā taṃ bāhiravatthusmiṃ, tathā hi mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a0:1982_6: dvīhi ākārehi bāhiravatthuṃ pariccajati yathāsukhaṃ paribhogāya vā yācakānaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1982_7: manorathaṃ paripūrento, attano vasībhāvāya vā, tattha sabbena sabbaṃ muttacāgo, evamahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1982_8: nissaṅgabhāvanāya sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissāmīti. Evaṃ ajjhattikavatthusminti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1983_0: Tattha yaṃ ajjhattikavatthu dīyamānaṃ yācakassa ekanteneva hitāya saṃvattati, taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1983_1: deti, na itaraṃ. Na ca mahāpuriso mārassa mārakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ vā vihiṃsādhippāyānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1983_2: attano attabhāvaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā jānamāno deti “mā tesaṃ anattho ahosī”ti. Yathā
atk-s0512a0:1983_3: ca mārakāyikānaṃ, evaṃ tehi anvāviṭṭhānampi na deti, napi ummattakānaṃ. Itaresaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1983_4: pana yāciyamāno samanantarameva deti, tādisāya yācanāya dullabhabhāvato tādisassa
atk-s0512a0:1984: Abhayadānaṃ pana rājato corato aggito udakato veripuggalato sīhabyagghādivāḷamigato nāgayakkharakkhasapisācādito sattānaṃ bhaye paccupaṭṭhite tato parittāṇabhāvena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1985_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittassa aviparītā dhammadesanā, opāyiko hitassa upadeso
atk-s0512a0:1985_1: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena yena sāsane anotiṇṇānaṃ avatāraṇaṃ otiṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1985_2: paripācanaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ nayo – saṅkhepato tāva dānakathā sīlakathā saggakathā kāmānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1985_3: ādīnavo saṃkileso ca nekkhamme ānisaṃso. Vitthārato pana sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimuttacittānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1985_4: saraṇagamanaṃ sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo
atk-s0512a0:1985_5: satta saddhammā aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammakaraṇavasena samathānuyogo rūpakāyādīsu
atk-s0512a0:1985_6: vipassanābhinivesesu yathārahaṃ abhinivesamukhena vipassanānuyogo, tathā visuddhipaṭipadā
atk-s0512a0:1985_7: sammattagahaṇaṃ tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā sāvakabodhīti etesaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1985_8: guṇasaṃkittanavasena yathārahaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca. Tathā
atk-s0512a0:1985_9: paccekabodhiyaṃ sammāsambodhiyañca adhimuttānaṃ sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ dānādipāramīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1985_10: sabhāvarasalakkhaṇādisaṃkittanamukhena tīsupi avatthāsu tesaṃ buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatāvibhāvanena
atk-s0512a0:1985_11: yānadvaye patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca. Evaṃ mahāpuriso sattānaṃ dhammadānaṃ deti.
atk-s0512a0:1986_0: Tathā mahāpuriso sattānaṃ āmisadānaṃ dento “imināhaṃ dānena sattānaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādisampattiñca
atk-s0512a0:1986_1: ramaṇīyaṃ aggaphalasampattiñca nipphādeyya”nti annadānaṃ deti, tathā sattānaṃ kāmakilesapipāsāvūpasamāya
atk-s0512a0:1986_2: pānaṃ deti, tathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya hirottappālaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni deti,
atk-s0512a0:1986_3: tathā iddhividhassa ceva nibbānasukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānaṃ deti, tathā sīlagandhanipphattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1986_4: gandhaṃ deti, tathā buddhaguṇasobhānipphattiyā mālāvilepanaṃ deti, bodhimaṇḍāsananipphattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1986_5: āsanaṃ deti, tathāgataseyyānipphattiyā seyyaṃ deti, saraṇabhāvanipphattiyā āvasathaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1986_6: deti, pañcacakkhupaṭilābhāya padīpeyyaṃ deti, byāmappabhānipphattiyā rūpadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:1986_7: brahmassaranipphattiyā saddadānaṃ deti, sabbalokassa piyabhāvāya rasadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:1986_8: buddhasukhumālabhāvāya phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ deti, ajarāmarabhāvāya bhesajjadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:1986_9: kilesadāsabyavimocanatthaṃ dāsānaṃ bhujissatādānaṃ deti, saddhammābhiratiyā anavajjakhiḍḍāratihetudānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1986_10: deti, sabbepi satte ariyāya jātiyā attano puttabhāvūpanayanāya puttadānaṃ deti, sakalassapi
atk-s0512a0:1986_11: lokassa patibhāvūpagamanāya dāradānaṃ deti, subhalakkhaṇasampattiyā suvaṇṇamaṇimuttāpavāḷādidānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1986_14: pādehi bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamanāya caraṇadānaṃ, caturoghanittharaṇāya sattānaṃ saddhammahatthadānatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1986_17: sabbalokena ca upajīvitabbo me kāyo bhaveyyā”ti maṃsalohitādidānaṃ, “sabbalokuttamo
atk-s0512a0:1987_0: Evaṃ dadanto ca na anesanāya deti, na ca paropaghātena, na bhayena, na lajjāya, na
atk-s0512a0:1987_1: dakkhiṇeyyarosanena, na paṇīte sati lūkhaṃ, na attukkaṃsanena, na paravambhanena,
atk-s0512a0:1987_2: na phalābhisaṅkhāya, na yācakajigucchāya, na acittīkārena deti, atha kho sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1987_3: deti, sahatthena deti, kālena deti, cittīkatvā deti, avibhāgena deti. Tīsu kālesu
atk-s0512a0:1987_4: somanassito deti, tato eva ca datvā na pacchānutāpī hoti. Na paṭiggāhakavasena mānāvamānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1987_5: karoti, paṭiggāhakānaṃ piyasamudācāro hoti vadaññū yācayogo saparivāradāyako. Annadānañhi
atk-s0512a0:1987_6: dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti vatthādīhi saddhiṃ deti. Tathā vatthadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1987_7: dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti annādīhi saddhiṃ deti. Yānadānādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0512a0:1988_0: Tathā rūpadānaṃ dento itarārammaṇānipi tassa parivāraṃ katvā deti, evaṃ sesesupi.
atk-s0512a0:1988_1: Tattha rūpadānaṃ nāma nīlapītalohitaodātādivaṇṇāsu pupphavatthadhātūsu aññataraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1988_2: labhitvā rūpavasena ābhujitvā “rūpadānaṃ dassāmi, rūpadānaṃ mayha”nti cintetvā tādise
atk-s0512a0:1988_3: dakkhiṇeyye dānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti savatthukaṃ katvā. Etaṃ rūpadānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0512a0:1989_0: Saddadānaṃ pana bherisaddādivasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha saddaṃ kandamūlāni viya uppāṭetvā
atk-s0512a0:1989_1: nīluppalahatthakaṃ viya ca hatthe ṭhapetvā dātuṃ na sakkā, savatthukaṃ pana katvā
atk-s0512a0:1989_2: dento saddadānaṃ deti nāma. Tasmā yadā “saddadānaṃ dassāmī”ti bherimudiṅgādīsu aññatarena
atk-s0512a0:1989_3: tūriyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karoti kāreti ca, “saddadānaṃ me”ti bheriādīni
atk-s0512a0:1989_4: ṭhapeti ṭhapāpeti ca. Dhammakathikānaṃ pana sarabhesajjaṃ telaphāṇitādiṃ deti, dhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1989_5: ghoseti, sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇati, dhammakathaṃ katheti, upanisinnakakathaṃ anumodanakathañca
atk-s0512a0:1989_6: karoti kāreti ca, tadā saddadānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1990_0: Tathā gandhadānaṃ mūlagandhādīsu aññataraṃ rajanīyaṃ gandhavatthuṃ piṃsitameva vā
atk-s0512a0:1990_1: gandhaṃ yaṃkiñci labhitvā gandhavasena ābhujitvā “gandhadānaṃ dassāmi, gandhadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1990_2: mayha”nti buddharatanādīnaṃ pūjaṃ karoti kāreti ca, gandhapūjanatthāya agarucandanādike
atk-s0512a0:1991_0: Tathā mūlarasādīsu yaṃkiñci rajanīyaṃ rasavatthuṃ labhitvā rasavasena ābhujitvā “rasadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1991_1: dassāmi, rasadānaṃ mayha”nti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deti, rasavatthumeva vā dhaññagavādikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1992_0: Tathā phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mañcapīṭhādivasena attharaṇapāvuraṇādivasena ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1992_1: Yadā hi mañcapīṭhabhisibimbohanādikaṃ nivāsanapārupanādikaṃ vā sukhasamphassaṃ rajanīyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1992_3: dassāmi, phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mayha”nti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deti. Yathāvuttaṃ phoṭṭhabbavatthuṃ
atk-s0512a0:1993_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana dhammārammaṇassa adhippetattā ojapānajīvitavasena veditabbaṃ. Ojādīsu
atk-s0512a0:1993_1: hi aññataraṃ rajanīyaṃ vatthuṃ labhitvā dhammārammaṇavasena ābhujitvā “dhammadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1993_2: dassāmi, dhammadānaṃ mayha”nti sappinavanītādiojadānaṃ deti. Ambapānādiaṭṭhavidhapānadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1993_3: deti, jīvitadānanti ābhujitvā salākabhattapakkhikabhattādīni deti, aphāsukabhāvena
atk-s0512a0:1993_4: abhibhūtānaṃ byādhitānaṃ vejje paccupaṭṭhāpeti, jālaṃ phālāpeti, kuminaṃ viddhaṃsāpeti,
atk-s0512a0:1993_5: sakuṇapañjaraṃ viddhaṃsāpeti, bandhanena baddhānaṃ sattānaṃ bandhanamokkhaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0512a0:1993_6: māghātabheriṃ carāpeti, aññāni ca sattānaṃ jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ evarūpāni kammāni
atk-s0512a0:1993_7: karoti kārāpeti ca. Idaṃ dhammadānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0512a0:1994_0: Sabbametaṃ yathāvuttaṃ dānasampadaṃ sakalalokahitasukhāya pariṇāmeti. Attano ca sammāsambodhiyā
atk-s0512a0:1994_1: akuppāya vimuttiyā aparikkhayassa chandassa aparikkhayassa vīriyassa aparikkhayassa
atk-s0512a0:1994_2: samādhissa aparikkhayassa paṭibhānassa aparikkhayassa ñāṇassa aparikkhayāya vimuttiyā
atk-s0512a0:1994_3: pariṇāmeti. Imañca dānapāramiṃ paṭipajjantena mahāsattena jīvite aniccasaññā paccupaṭṭhāpetabbā
atk-s0512a0:1994_4: tathā bhogesu, bahusādhāraṇatā ca nesaṃ manasikātabbā, sattesu ca mahākaruṇā satataṃ
atk-s0512a0:1994_5: samitaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetabbā. Evañhi bhoge gahetabbasāraṃ gaṇhanto ādittato viya agārato
atk-s0512a0:1994_6: sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ attānañca bahi nīharanto na kiñci seseti, na katthaci vibhāgaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1994_7: karoti, aññadatthu nirapekkho nissajjati eva. Ayaṃ tāva dānapāramiyā paṭipattikkamo.
atk-s0512a0:1995_0: Sīlapāramiyā pana ayaṃ paṭipattikkamo – yasmā sabbaññusīlālaṅkārehi satte alaṅkaritukāmena
atk-s0512a0:1995_1: mahāpurisena ādito attano eva tāva sīlaṃ visodhetabbaṃ. Tattha ca catūhi ākārehi
atk-s0512a0:1995_2: sīlaṃ visujjhati – ajjhāsayavisuddhito, samādānato, avītikkamanato, sati ca vītikkame
atk-s0512a0:1995_3: puna paṭipākatikakaraṇato. Visuddhāsayatāya hi ekacco attādhipati hutvā pāpajigucchanasabhāvo
atk-s0512a0:1995_4: ajjhattaṃ hiridhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā suparisuddhasamācāro hoti. Tathā parato samādāne
atk-s0512a0:1995_5: sati ekacco lokādhipati hutvā pāpato uttasanto ottappadhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā suparisuddhasamācāro
atk-s0512a0:1995_6: hoti. Iti ubhayathāpi ete avītikkamanato sīle patiṭṭhahanti. Atha pana kadāci satisammosena
atk-s0512a0:1995_7: sīlassa khaṇḍādibhāvo siyā. Tāyayeva yathāvuttāya hirottappasampattiyā khippameva
atk-s0512a0:1996_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ vārittaṃ, cārittanti duvidhaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ bodhisattassa vārittasīle
atk-s0512a0:1996_1: paṭipattikkamo – sabbasattesu tathā dayāpannacittena bhavitabbaṃ, yathā supinantenapi
atk-s0512a0:1996_2: na āghāto uppajjeyya. Parūpakāraniratatāya parasantako alagaddo viya na parāmasitabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1996_3: Sace pabbajito hoti, abrahmacariyatopi ārācārī hoti sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavirahito,
atk-s0512a0:1996_4: pageva paradāragamanato. Sace pana apabbajito gahaṭṭho samāno paresaṃ dāresu sadā
atk-s0512a0:1996_5: pāpakaṃ cittampi na uppādeti. Kathento ca saccaṃ hitaṃ piyaṃ vacanaṃ parimitameva
atk-s0512a0:1996_6: ca kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti, sabbattha anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto aviparītadassano
atk-s0512a0:1996_7: kammassakatañāṇena ca samannāgato sammaggatesu sammāpaṭipannesu niviṭṭhasaddho hoti niviṭṭhapemo.
atk-s0512a0:1997_0: Iti caturāpāyavaṭṭadukkhānaṃ pathabhūtehi akusalakammapathehi akusaladhammehi ca
atk-s0512a0:1997_1: oramitvā saggamokkhānaṃ pathabhūtesu kusalakammapathesu patiṭṭhitassa mahāpurisassa
atk-s0512a0:1997_2: parisuddhāsayapayogatāya yathābhipatthitā sattānaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhitā manorathā sīghaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1997_3: sīghaṃ abhinipphajjanti, pāramiyo paripūrenti. Evaṃbhūto hi ayaṃ. Tattha hiṃsānivattiyā
atk-s0512a0:1997_4: sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ deti, appakasireneva mettābhāvanaṃ sampādeti, ekādasa mettānisaṃse
atk-s0512a0:1997_5: adhigacchati, appābādho hoti appātaṅko, dīghāyuko sukhabahulo lakkhaṇavisese pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0512a0:1998_0: Tathā adinnādānanivattiyā corādīhi asādhāraṇe bhoge adhigacchati. Parehi anāsaṅkanīyo
atk-s0512a0:1998_1: piyo manāpo vissasanīyo vibhavasampattīsu alaggacitto pariccāgasīlo lobhavāsanañca samucchindati.
atk-s0512a0:1999_0: Abrahmacariyanivattiyā alolo hoti santakāyacitto, sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo aparisaṅkanīyo,
atk-s0512a0:1999_1: kalyāṇo cassa kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, alaggacitto hoti mātugāmesu aluddhāsayo,
atk-s0512a0:2000_0: Musāvādanivattiyā sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto hoti paccayiko theto ādeyyavacano, devatānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2000_1: piyo manāpo, surabhigandhamukho ārakkhitakāyavacīsamācāro, lakkhaṇavisese ca adhigacchati,
atk-s0512a0:2001: Pesuññanivattiyā parūpakkamehipi abhejjakāyo hoti abhejjaparivāro, saddhammesu ca abhejjanakasaddho, daḷhamitto bhavantaraparicitānaṃ viya sattānaṃ ekantapiyo asaṃkilesabahulo.
atk-s0512a0:2002: Pharusavācānivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo sukhasīlo madhuravacano sambhāvanīyo, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato cassa saro nibbattati.
atk-s0512a0:2003_0: Samphappalāpanivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo ca ādeyyavacano parimitālāpo.
atk-s0512a0:2003_1: Mahesakkho ca hoti mahānubhāvo, ṭhānuppattikena paṭibhānena pañhānaṃ byākaraṇakusalo,
atk-s0512a0:2003_2: buddhabhūmiyañca ekāya eva vācāya anekabhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ anekesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamattho hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2004_0: Anabhijjhālutāya icchitalābhī hoti, uḷāresu ca bhogesu ruciṃ paṭilabhati, khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2004_1: sammato hoti, paccatthikehi anabhibhavanīyo, indriyavekallaṃ na pāpuṇāti, appaṭipuggalo ca hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2005: Abyāpādena piyadassano hoti, sattānaṃ sambhāvanīyo parahitābhinanditāya ca satte appakasireneva pasādeti, alūkhasabhāvo ca hoti mettāvihārī, mahesakkho ca hoti mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0512a0:2006_0: Micchādassanābhāvena kalyāṇe sahāye paṭilabhati, sīsacchedampi pāpuṇanto pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2006_1: na karoti, kammassakatādassanato akotūhalamaṅgaliko ca hoti, saddhamme cassa saddhā
atk-s0512a0:2006_2: patiṭṭhitā hoti mūlajātā, saddahati ca tathāgatānaṃ bodhiṃ, samayantaresu nābhiramati
atk-s0512a0:2006_3: ukkāraṭṭhāne viya rājahaṃso, lakkhaṇattayaparijānanakusalo hoti, ante ca anāvaraṇañāṇalābhī,
atk-s0512a0:2006_4: yāva bodhiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca hoti,
atk-s0512a0:2006_5: uḷāruḷārā sampattiyo pāpuṇāti. Iti hidaṃ sīlaṃ nāma sabbasampattīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2006_6: sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ pabhavabhūmi, sabbabuddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ mukhaṃ pamukhanti
atk-s0512a0:2006_7: bahumānanaṃ uppādetvā kāyavacīsaṃyame indriyadamane ājīvavisuddhiyaṃ paccayaparibhogesu
atk-s0512a0:2006_8: ca satisampajaññabalena appamattena lābhasakkārasilokaṃ mittamukhapaccatthikaṃ viya
atk-s0512a0:2006_9: sallakkhetvā “kikīva aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sakkaccaṃ sīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2007_0: Cārittasīle pana paṭipatti evaṃ veditabbā – idha bodhisatto kalyāṇamittānaṃ garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2007_1: abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kālena kālaṃ kattā hoti, tathā
atk-s0512a0:2007_2: tesaṃ kālena kālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ kattā hoti, gilānānaṃ kāyaveyyāvaṭikaṃ. Subhāsitapadāni
atk-s0512a0:2007_3: sutvā sādhukāraṃ kattā hoti, guṇavantānaṃ guṇe vaṇṇetā paresaṃ apakāre khantā, upakāre
atk-s0512a0:2007_4: anussaritā, puññāni anumoditā, attano puññāni sammāsambodhiyā pariṇāmetā, sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2007_5: appamādavihārī kusalesu dhammesu, sati ca accaye accayato disvā tādisānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2007_6: yathābhūtaṃ āvikattā, uttari ca sammāpaṭipattiṃ sammadeva paripūretā.
atk-s0512a0:2008_0: Tathā attano anurūpāsu atthūpasaṃhitāsu sattānaṃ itikattabbatāsu dakkho analaso sahāyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2008_1: upagacchati. Uppannesu ca sattānaṃ byādhiādidukkhesu yathārahaṃ patikāravidhāyako.
atk-s0512a0:2008_3: dhammeneva niggaṇhanako yāvadeva akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanāya. Paggahārahānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2008_4: dhammeneva paggaṇhanako. Yāni purimakānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ uḷāratamāni paramadukkarāni
atk-s0512a0:2008_5: acinteyyānubhāvāni sattānaṃ ekantahitasukhāvahāni caritāni, yehi nesaṃ bodhisambhārā
atk-s0512a0:2008_6: sammadeva paripākaṃ agamaṃsu, tāni sutvā anubbiggo anutrāso tepi mahāpurisā manussā
atk-s0512a0:2008_7: eva, kamena pana sikkhāpāripūriyā bhāvitattabhāvā tādisāya uḷāratamāya ānubhāvasampattiyā
atk-s0512a0:2008_8: bodhisambhāresu ukkaṃsapāramippattā ahesuṃ, tasmā mayāpi sīlādisikkhāsu sammadeva
atk-s0512a0:2008_9: tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ, yāya paṭipattiyā ahampi anukkamena sikkhaṃ paripūretvā ekantato
atk-s0512a0:2008_10: taṃ padaṃ anupāpuṇissāmīti saddhāpurecārikaṃ vīriyaṃ avissajjento sammadeva sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2009_0: Tathā paṭicchannakalyāṇo hoti vivaṭāparādho, appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho
atk-s0512a0:2009_1: dukkhasaho aparitassanajātiko anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco santindriyo
atk-s0512a0:2009_2: santamānaso kuhanādimicchājīvarahito ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī
atk-s0512a0:2009_3: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu āraddhavīriyo pahitatto kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkho,
atk-s0512a0:2009_4: appamattakampi kāye jīvite vā apekkhaṃ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti, pageva adhimattaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2009_5: Sabbepi dussīlyahetubhūte kodhūpanāhādike upakkilese pajahati vinodeti. Appamattakena
atk-s0512a0:2009_6: ca visesādhigamena aparituṭṭho hoti, na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati, uparūpari visesādhigamāya vāyamati.
atk-s0512a0:2010_0: Yena yathāladdhā sampatti hānabhāgiyā vā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti, tathā mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a0:2010_1: andhānaṃ pariṇāyako hoti, maggaṃ ācikkhati, badhirānaṃ hatthamuddāya saññaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:2010_2: atthamanuggāheti, tathā mūgānaṃ. Pīṭhasappikānaṃ pīṭhaṃ deti yānaṃ deti vāheti vā.
atk-s0512a0:2010_3: Assaddhānaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhāya vāyamati, kusītānaṃ ussāhajananāya, muṭṭhassatīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2010_4: satisamāyogāya, vibbhantacittānaṃ samādhisampadāya, duppaññānaṃ paññādhigamāya vāyamati.
atk-s0512a0:2010_7: vāyamati. Pubbakārīnaṃ sattānaṃ kataññutaṃ nissāya pubbabhāsī piyavādī saṅgāhako
atk-s0512a0:2010_8: sadisena adhikena vā paccupakārena sammānetā hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2011_0: Āpadāsu sahāyakiccaṃ anutiṭṭhati. Tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ pakatisabhāvañca parijānitvā
atk-s0512a0:2011_1: yehi yathā saṃvasitabbaṃ hoti, tehi tathā saṃvasati. Yesu ca yathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2011_2: hoti, tesu tathā paṭipajjati. Tañca kho akusalato vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanavasena,
atk-s0512a0:2011_3: na aññathā. Paracittānurakkhaṇā hi bodhisattānaṃ yāvadeva kusalābhivaḍḍhiyā. Tathā
atk-s0512a0:2011_4: hitajjhāsayenāpi paro na hiṃsitabbo, na bhaṇḍitabbo, na maṅkubhāvamāpādetabbo, na
atk-s0512a0:2011_5: parassa kukkuccaṃ uppādetabbaṃ, na niggahaṭṭhāne na codetabbo, na nīcataraṃ paṭipannassa
atk-s0512a0:2011_6: attā uccatare ṭhapetabbo, na ca paresu sabbena sabbaṃ asevinā bhavitabbaṃ, na atisevinā
atk-s0512a0:2012_0: Sevitabbayutte pana satte desakālānurūpaṃ sevati. Na ca paresaṃ purato piye vigarahati,
atk-s0512a0:2012_1: appiye vā pasaṃsati. Na avissaṭṭhavissāsī hoti. Na dhammikaṃ upanimantanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0512a0:2012_2: Na saññattiṃ upagacchati, nādhikaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Saddhāsampanne saddhānisaṃsakathāya
atk-s0512a0:2012_3: sampahaṃsati. Sīlasutacāgapaññāsampanne paññāsampannakathāya sampahaṃsati. Sace pana
atk-s0512a0:2012_4: bodhisatto abhiññābalappatto hoti, pamādāpanne satte abhiññābalena yathārahaṃ nirayādike
atk-s0512a0:2012_5: dassento saṃvejetvā assaddhādike saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti. Sāsane otāreti. Saddhādiguṇasampanne
atk-s0512a0:2012_6: paripāceti. Evamayaṃ mahāpurisassa cārittabhūto aparimāṇo puññābhisando kusalābhisando
atk-s0512a0:2013_0: Api ca yā sā “kiṃ sīlaṃ kenaṭṭhena sīla”ntiādinā pucchaṃ katvā “pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa
atk-s0512a0:2013_1: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā sīla”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato
atk-s0512a0:2013_2: sīlassa vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā, sā sabbāpi idha āharitvā vattabbā. Kevalañhi
atk-s0512a0:2013_3: tattha sāvakabodhisattavasena sīlakathā āgatā, idha mahābodhisattavasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2013_4: katvā vattabbāti ayameva viseso. Yato idaṃ sīlaṃ mahāpuriso yathā na attano duggatiyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2013_5: parikkilesavimuttiyā sugatiyampi, na rajjasampattiyā, na cakkavatti, na deva, na
atk-s0512a0:2013_6: sakka, na māra, na brahmasampattiyā pariṇāmeti, tathā na attano tevijjatāya, na chaḷabhiññatāya,
atk-s0512a0:2013_7: na catuppaṭisambhidādhigamāya, na sāvakabodhiyā, na paccekabodhiyā, pariṇāmeti, atha
atk-s0512a0:2014_0: Tathā yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā kāmehi ca bhavehi
atk-s0512a0:2014_1: ca nikkhamanavasena pavattā kusalacittuppatti nekkhammapāramī, tasmā sakalasaṃkilesanivāsanaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0512a0:2014_3: ca gharāvāsassa nekkhammasukhādīnaṃ anokāsataṃ, kāmānañca satthadhārālaggamadhubindu
atk-s0512a0:2014_4: viya ca avaliyhamānā parittassādā vipulānatthānubandhāti ca, vijjulatobhāsena gahetabbanaccaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2014_5: viya parittakālūpalabbhā, ummattakālaṅkāro viya viparītasaññāya anubhavitabbā, karīsāvacchādanā
atk-s0512a0:2014_6: viya patikārabhūtā, udakatemitaṅguliyā tanūdakapānaṃ viya atittikarā, chātajjhattabhojanaṃ
